Storm Upends Northeast Travel","topic":"News","sources":["https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/winter-storm-bears-down-us-northeast-disrupting-airline-travel-2025-12-27/","https://www.governor.ny.gov/news/governor-hochul-declares-state-emergency-and-provides-update-state-response-statewide-winter?utm_source=openai","https://nj.gov/governor/news/news/562025/approved/20251226a.shtml?utm_source=openai","https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/12/27/over-1500-flights-cancelled-as-winter-storm-devin-hits-us-holiday-travel?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A winter storm strikes the U.S. Northeast on Saturday. Many flights stop, and travel plans change. People still want holiday trips and pretty scenery.

New York declares an emergency, which means extra help is ready. New Jersey also declares an emergency, so roads can get faster support. State crews work on highways and near airports.

Snow and ice hit cities and some wilderness areas. Drivers slow down because roads are slick. Many travelers stay inside, so they avoid danger.

Airlines cancel many flights, and many others delay. Airport crews clear runways and move planes. This is the reality for people who fly in winter.

Officials tell people to check alerts when they travel. They say pack supplies because help can be slow. Some families wait, but they keep calm.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A winter storm struck the U.S. Northeast on Saturday, disrupting holiday travel as airlines canceled and delayed many flights. Travelers hoping for scenic trips found themselves rerouting or waiting for updates.

New York declared an emergency to speed up response and coordinate resources across the state. New Jersey also declared an emergency, warning residents about hazardous roads and changing conditions.

Snow, ice, and strong winds affected cities and nearby wilderness areas, where travel can become risky faster. Officials urged people to limit driving because a small mistake can lead to big problems.

Transportation crews worked through the day to clear highways, treat roads, and keep airport operations moving. Even so, the reality of winter travel set in as cancellations spread and schedules kept shifting.

Airlines and local agencies told travelers to check flight status and watch weather alerts. They also advised packing extra supplies in case delays turn into overnight waits.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A winter storm moving into the U.S. Northeast on Dec. 27 brought a familiar collision between holiday demand and operational limits, with flights canceled, roads worsening, and schedules repeatedly rewritten. For travelers chasing seasonal scenery, the shift from leisure to logistics happened quickly, and sometimes abruptly.

New York and New Jersey issued emergency declarations, a policy move designed to accelerate coordination, staffing, and resource deployment as conditions deteriorated. State transportation crews, airport teams, and utility workers worked extended rotations, prioritizing highway treatment, runway clearing, and rapid response to weather-driven incidents.

The storm’s impact was uneven—dense urban corridors experienced cascading delays, while surrounding wilderness routes faced heightened risk from reduced visibility and icy surfaces. In practical terms, once the storm struck, personal decision-making became as consequential as infrastructure performance, because a single crash can snarl an entire region’s mobility.

The broader reality is that winter systems expose how tightly coupled modern travel has become: aircraft positioning, crew availability, and runway throughput can all fail at once under the same weather constraints. With advisories urging people to limit nonessential travel and to monitor official alerts, the day’s disruptions underscored a blunt lesson—preparedness, not optimism, is the decisive variable when storms arrive.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":5,"missing_words":["strike"]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"scenery","phonetic":"/ˈsiːnəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the natural or pleasant view of a place, especially in the countryside"}]},{"word":"wilderness","phonetic":"/ˈwɪldərnəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a wild, natural area that is not developed or controlled by people"}]},{"word":"strike","phonetic":"/straɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"verb","definition":"to hit something, or to happen suddenly and have a strong effect"},{"pos":"noun","definition":"a period when workers stop working to demand better pay or conditions"}]},{"word":"emergency","phonetic":"/ɪˈmɜːrdʒənsi/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a serious and unexpected situation that requires immediate action"}]},{"word":"crew","phonetic":"/kruː/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a group of people who work together, especially on a vehicle, aircraft, or a specific task"}]},{"word":"reality","phonetic":"/riˈæləti/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the true situation or the way things actually are"}]}]}}

Law","topic":"Tech","sources":["https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-revises-aviation-law-regulate-drones-tighten-safety-rules-2025-12-27/?utm_source=openai","https://english.news.cn/20251227/0b34b5e5785e4312a1c7342744932fcf/c.html?utm_source=openai","https://www.news.cn/politics/20251227/f9da52c8ec6048b48e4134f320298b1d/c.html?utm_source=openai","https://www.chinadailyhk.com/article/626104?utm_source=openai","https://www.straitstimes.com/asia/east-asia/china-revises-aviation-law-to-regulate-drones-tighten-safety-rules?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A new headline comes from China today about drone rules. Lawmakers pass a new law on civil aviation. It controls drone technology and makes safety rules stronger.

Many outdoor businesses use drones for work and travel. The law asks for permits and clear ID codes. Each participant must follow these rules because accidents can happen.

Some people see a dramatic change in daily drone use. Drones can help survival in disasters and remote areas. The rules try to keep flights safe and organized.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A new headline on Dec. 27 said China revised its Civil Aviation Law to regulate drones and tighten safety rules. The update aimed to add clearer oversight of fast-growing drone technology. The law is set to take effect in 2026.

Officials and industry groups said the changes could reshape how each participant operates, from manufacturers to delivery firms. Drones are widely used for outdoor work such as inspections, mapping, and logistics. Companies may need permits, identification systems, and stricter compliance steps.

The move was described as a dramatic policy shift because drones are spreading quickly across cities and rural areas. Supporters said clearer rules could reduce risks and improve safety. They also noted drones can support survival needs during emergencies by reaching hard-to-access locations.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A headline from Beijing on 2025-12-27 underscored a broader regulatory turn: China revised its Civil Aviation Law, seeking to standardize drone technology governance and tighten safety requirements across the sector. The overhaul, approved by lawmakers, is positioned as a system-level response to the rapid expansion of low-altitude aviation. Reported timelines indicate the amendments will take effect in 2026.

For each participant in the drone ecosystem—manufacturers, operators, logistics platforms, and local regulators—the changes could be dramatic, not merely procedural. By formalizing requirements such as permitting, identification, and operational oversight, the law aims to make accountability traceable when incidents occur. In practice, that may raise compliance costs while reducing uncertainty for legitimate businesses.

The implications reach well beyond hobby flying and into outdoor commerce and public services, where drones increasingly support inspections, tourism-related imaging, and last-mile delivery. In disaster scenarios, drones can contribute to survival outcomes by scouting routes, locating victims, or delivering critical supplies. If enforcement is consistent, the revisions may accelerate safer adoption, even as they narrow the space for informal or gray-market operations.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"outdoor","phonetic":"/ˌaʊtˈdɔːr/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"happening or done outside, not inside a building"}]},{"word":"survival","phonetic":"/səˈvaɪvəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the state of continuing to live or exist, especially in difficult conditions"}]},{"word":"headline","phonetic":"/ˈhedlaɪn/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the title of a news story in a newspaper, on a website, or in a broadcast"}]},{"word":"participant","phonetic":"/pɑːrˈtɪsɪpənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a person or group that takes part in an activity, event, or process"}]},{"word":"dramatic","phonetic":"/drəˈmætɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"sudden, very noticeable, and often surprising or impressive"}]},{"word":"technology","phonetic":"/tɛkˈnɑːlədʒi/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the use of scientific knowledge, tools, and methods to solve problems or create products"}]}]}}

Diplomacy","topic":"News","sources":["https://apnews.com/article/d773c83734e2a6d395f2304d3e2708af?utm_source=openai","https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2025/12/28/two-killed-in-johor-highway-accident?utm_source=openai","https://english.news.cn/20251226/b69155a0edb646c198367670904f4fe7/c.html?utm_source=openai","https://unn.ua/en/amp/zelenskyy-and-trump-to-meet-on-war-termination-plan-but-face-disagreements-on-key-issues-reuters?utm_source=openai","https://kyivindependent.com/ukraine-war-latest-ukraine-us-delegations-to-meet-next-week-zelensky-announces/?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Snow covers an expressway in Japan, and many cars crash. Drivers fear for survival when smoke and fire rise.

In Malaysia, another expressway crash happens, so police warn drivers. The road feels like a game level, but mistakes cost lives.

In China, a long tunnel opens, and travel feels faster. People enjoy mountain scenery and visit a village for food. A skyscraper is a very tall building, but small towns still matter. A delegation is a group of officials, and it meets an ally to talk.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Heavy snow and ice contributed to a serious crash on a Japanese expressway, according to reports. Drivers described a struggle for survival as vehicles collided and flames appeared.

In Malaysia’s Johor state, another expressway accident killed people and injured others, local coverage said. Officials urged caution because wet roads and speed can quickly turn routine travel into an emergency.

Separately, China reported the opening of a major tunnel linked to an expressway route, cutting travel time across mountain terrain. The change could bring more visitors to rural scenery and a village economy, even as nearby cities add new skyscraper projects. On the diplomatic front, a Ukrainian delegation planned talks with a key ally, as leaders weighed proposals and disagreements.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A winter chain-reaction on a Japanese expressway underscored how quickly mobility can collapse when weather, speed, and visibility converge, leaving drivers to prioritize survival over schedules.

Hours later in Malaysia, another fatal expressway collision renewed scrutiny of enforcement and driver behavior, especially on stretches where fatigue and wet conditions amplify small errors.

Infrastructure news offered a counterpoint: China’s newly opened mountain tunnel, integrated into an expressway corridor, reframed distance as a design problem while expanding access to high-altitude scenery and remote village routes.

Diplomacy moved in parallel, with a Ukrainian delegation engaging an ally amid shifting proposals; in capital cities of glass and skyscraper skylines, political timelines often outpace the realities on roads.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"expressway","phonetic":"/ɪkˈsprɛsweɪ/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a major road designed for fast traffic, with limited entrances and exits"}]},{"word":"skyscraper","phonetic":"/ˈskaɪˌskreɪpər/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a very tall modern building, usually in a city"}]},{"word":"delegation","phonetic":"/ˌdɛlɪˈɡeɪʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a group of people chosen to represent others, especially in talks or events"}]},{"word":"scenery","phonetic":"/ˈsiːnəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the natural or attractive features of a place that you can see"}]},{"word":"village","phonetic":"/ˈvɪlɪdʒ/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a small town or community in the countryside"}]},{"word":"ally","phonetic":"/ˈælaɪ/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a person or country that supports another in a shared cause or agreement"}]},{"word":"survival","phonetic":"/sərˈvaɪvəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the state of continuing to live or exist, especially in difficult conditions"}]}]}}

Playoffs","topic":"News","sources":["https://apnews.com/article/1dc6429f0b3e2ff4a52e351eeeae23cc?utm_source=openai","https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-finance-ministry-says-fiscal-policies-will-be-more-proactive-2026-2025-12-28/?utm_source=openai","https://www.reuters.com/sports/nfl/texans-clinch-playoff-berth-by-beating-chargers-8th-straight-win--flm-2025-12-28/?utm_source=openai","https://www.abc.net.au/news/2025-12-28/travel-disruptions-united-states-heavy-snowfall/106182628?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A winter storm hits the U.S., and travel plans change today. Many flights stop because roads turn icy and wet.

Some families stay inside, but they still seek treasure moments. They plan exploration. This means they learn new places.

Parks close, so outdoor fun becomes less accessible for travelers. The main objective is safety and warm shelter for everyone.

In the NFL league, Houston beats Los Angeles in a close game. Fans cheer at home, and the win feels like treasure.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A powerful winter storm disrupted U.S. travel on Sunday, grounding flights and slowing highways as snow and ice spread. Airports urged passengers to check updates, because conditions changed quickly and crews struggled to keep runways clean.

Tourism operators reported canceled outdoor trips, but some travelers turned the delay into exploration of museums and local food. For many families, the objective was simple: stay safe, stay together, and treat extra time as a treasure.

In Beijing, the finance ministry said 2026 fiscal policy would be more proactive, aiming to support growth and livelihoods. Officials highlighted making services more accessible and encouraging investment, as governments sought steady revenue after a difficult year.

On the sports front, the Houston Texans beat the Los Angeles Chargers 20-16, clinching a playoff berth in the NFL league. The victory, secured by early long touchdowns, gave fans another reason to stay home and watch.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As a winter storm barreled across parts of the United States, post-holiday travel was snarled, with cancellations mounting and road crews stretched thin. For airlines and emergency managers, the objective shifted from convenience to continuity, prioritizing de-icing, staffing, and clear public warnings. Delayed passengers, many seeking outdoor adventures, improvised, keeping plans accessible by swapping hikes for exploration of indoor attractions and local food.

Across the Pacific, China’s finance ministry signaled a more proactive 2026 stance, a message meant to steady expectations as growth headwinds persist. Funds were pledged toward priorities such as consumption support and social services, with officials emphasizing that benefits should be broadly accessible. In a year when weather shocks and cost pressures can overwhelm households, that policy exploration becomes part of the larger economic narrative.

Meanwhile in the NFL league, the Houston Texans—leaning on early explosive plays—beat the Los Angeles Chargers 20-16 to clinch a playoff berth. For fans stuck at home by icy streets, the game offered a different kind of outdoor dream, a shared treasure watched from warm couches. Taken together, disrupted itineraries, fiscal signaling, and weekend results showed how communities adapt, balancing objective risk management with the human urge to explore.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"treasure","phonetic":"/ˈtrɛʒər/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"something very valuable or greatly loved"},{"pos":"verb","definition":"to value something highly and keep it carefully"}]},{"word":"exploration","phonetic":"/ˌɛkspləˈreɪʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the act of traveling or searching to discover new places or information"}]},{"word":"accessible","phonetic":"/əkˈsɛsəbəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"easy to reach, use, enter, or understand"}]},{"word":"league","phonetic":"/liːɡ/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a group of teams or organizations that compete in a shared system"}]},{"word":"objective","phonetic":"/əbˈdʒɛktɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a goal or purpose that someone aims to achieve"},{"pos":"adjective","definition":"based on facts rather than personal feelings or opinions"}]},{"word":"outdoor","phonetic":"/ˈaʊtˌdɔːr/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"happening outside, not inside a building"}]}]}}

News","sources":["https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-military-conduct-live-fire-exercises-around-taiwan-tuesday-2025-12-28/?utm_source=openai","https://focustaiwan.tw/business/202512290014?utm_source=openai","https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/12/29/china-to-stage-drills-around-taiwan-in-stern-warning-to-external-forces?utm_source=openai","https://focustaiwan.tw/cross-strait/202512290019?utm_source=openai","https://amp.dw.com/zh/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%8D%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E5%9B%B4%E5%8F%B0%E5%86%9B%E6%BC%94-%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E6%AC%B2%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95%E6%97%A5%E7%BE%8E%E5%8F%B0%E5%8F%8D%E5%BA%94/a-75325863?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"On Dec. 29, 2025, media report drills near Taiwan. Media means news groups, and they share updates fast. China holds live-fire exercises and calls them a strong signal.

A signal is a sign, and leaders send it publicly. Taiwan says the zones touch its territory and raise tension. Territory means claimed land, and it can include nearby seas.

Currency means money, and it moves in markets. The U.S. dollar slips and the Taiwan dollar edges up. Traders watch the signal, because they dislike surprises.

For travelers, the highlight is clear routes and calm airports. Some flights change paths when drills affect the sea. Tourists still want scenery, but they avoid risky coasts.

In many games, a signal on a map warns players. This news feels similar, so travelers check media again. Scenery is the view, and tourists love it.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"On Dec. 29, 2025, Chinese forces held live-fire drills around Taiwan, according to Reuters and Al Jazeera. Taiwan’s defense ministry said the exercise zones neared its territory, a message that officials called a political signal. The media focus quickly became the day’s highlight, with maps and alerts spreading across phones and airport screens.

In Taipei, the U.S. dollar slipped against the Taiwan dollar, and traders treated the move as a risk signal. Focus Taiwan reported that the currency market stayed orderly, but dealers watched headlines for any sign of escalation.

Travel planners said some routes could be adjusted when airspace warnings appeared, even as tourists chased winter scenery. Airlines and ferry operators relied on official notices, and passengers refreshed media updates before they checked in. One analyst compared the standoff to a strategy game, where territory matters and each signal changes play.

By evening, officials urged calm, and travelers said they still wanted the island’s scenery once the tension eased. The drills dominated regional media, and the shifting currency rates kept investors alert to the next headline.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Live-fire exercises around Taiwan, reported on Dec. 29, 2025 by Reuters and Al Jazeera, were presented as a stern signal aimed at “external forces.” Taiwan’s defense ministry said the designated areas pressed close to its territory, sharpening a familiar dispute over lines on maps and at sea.

In parallel, the market story was written in currency quotes: Focus Taiwan said the U.S. dollar weakened against the Taiwan dollar as traders priced in fresh uncertainty. In a news cycle where media alerts travel faster than official communiqués, even small FX moves can become a second signal about confidence.

For travel, the practical concern was routing, not rhetoric, with some passengers monitoring notices and adjusting plans to protect bookings and connections. The day’s highlight for many tourists remained the promise of scenery—coastlines, harbors, and winter city views—yet the risk calculus pushed some itineraries inland.

Taken together, the episode resembled a strategy game played in real time, with territory, timing, and messaging all scoring points at once. Still, the consequences were tangible: schedules tightened, headlines multiplied, and the region’s currency and travel sentiment reacted to each new signal.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"currency","phonetic":"/ˈkʌrənsi/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the money used in a particular country, or money in general used for buying and selling"}]},{"word":"media","phonetic":"/ˈmiːdiə/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"newspapers, television, radio, and online organizations that provide news and information"}]},{"word":"signal","phonetic":"/ˈsɪɡnəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a sign or message that communicates information or gives a warning"}]},{"word":"territory","phonetic":"/ˈtɛrətɔːri/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"an area of land (and sometimes surrounding waters) controlled or claimed by a country or group"}]},{"word":"highlight","phonetic":"/ˈhaɪlaɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the most important, interesting, or memorable part of something"}]},{"word":"scenery","phonetic":"/ˈsiːnəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the natural views and features of a place, especially in the countryside or by the sea"}]}]}}

is a small **village** in the mountains. It is usually very quiet. A new game is on **mobile** phones. This game is famous now. It is a big **phenomenon**. Many players love the game. They visit the small place.

The visitors are everywhere. The crowds **overwhelm** the old streets. Every **inhabitant** sees the changes. There is a **boom** in tourism. The shops sell many things. The people like the money. But the noise is loud.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A quiet **village** has suddenly become famous because of a digital trend. A popular **mobile** game features a map that looks exactly like this real location. This strange coincidence has created a global **phenomenon**. Thousands of fans travel there to take photos and play the game together.

The huge crowds **overwhelm** the small streets and the local shops. Every **inhabitant** is surprised by the sudden changes in their town. Business owners enjoy the tourism **boom** because they earn much more money now. However, the heavy traffic and constant noise are difficult for the locals to manage daily.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"In an unprecedented turn of events, a secluded **village** has been thrust into the global spotlight due to the virality of a cutting-edge **mobile** application. This digital **phenomenon** began when gamers noticed striking similarities between the game's virtual landscapes and the real-world architecture of this remote community.

Consequently, waves of enthusiastic tourists have begun to **overwhelm** the municipality's limited infrastructure, causing significant disruption to daily operations. While the local economy is experiencing a substantial **boom**, the sudden influx of visitors has sparked a complex debate within the community.

Practically every **inhabitant** must now navigate the delicate balance between capitalizing on this newfound financial prosperity and preserving their town's historical tranquility.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"village","phonetic":"/ˈvɪlɪdʒ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A group of houses and associated buildings, larger than a hamlet and smaller than a town, situated in a rural area."}]},{"word":"mobile","phonetic":"/ˈmoʊbəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"Relating to mobile phones, handheld computers, and similar technology."}]},{"word":"phenomenon","phonetic":"/fəˈnɒmɪnən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A fact or situation that is observed to exist or happen, especially one whose cause or explanation is in question; a remarkable event."}]},{"word":"overwhelm","phonetic":"/ˌoʊvərˈwɛlm/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"To have a strong emotional effect on; to be too much to deal with."}]},{"word":"inhabitant","phonetic":"/ɪnˈhæbɪtənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A person or animal that lives in or occupies a place."}]},{"word":"boom","phonetic":"/buːm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A period of great prosperity or rapid economic growth."}]}]}}

yIzxsMB9LArip-61zqq8NhnNDUI4rY4mbnOmo8NjQss7ABvGhNLOCsq-9YsloycXmDAtFkHQ0X1_AThPPZjZqTYoLWW"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A new race starts in New Zealand soon. It is a very hard game for strong people. Many people come from different countries. Every participant wants to win the prize. They travel to the South Island for this big event. The teams must move fast. They compete against other groups day and night. They want to be the first team at the finish line.

The race happens in a wild place. The teams walk into the deep wilderness. There are no roads or houses there. They see big mountains and cold rivers. The ground is rough and hard to walk on. The path is sometimes perilous for the runners. They must be very careful on the steep rocks. The weather also changes very fast. It can rain or snow suddenly.

This sport is a test of strength. It tests their endurance for a long time. The race takes many days to finish. The teams do not sleep very much. They must walk and run for hundreds of kilometers. They carry heavy bags on their backs. They also ride bikes and use small boats. Their bodies get very tired. They must keep moving even when they hurt.

However, the race is also beautiful. The land looks amazing in the morning. The tall mountains are magnificent to see. The water in the rivers is clear and blue. The runners see nature that is quiet and clean. They feel happy when they look at the views. This makes the hard work feel good. They finish the race with good memories.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A famous adventure event is taking place in New Zealand this month. It attracts people who love extreme sports and nature. These athletes travel to the South Island to join a special race. Each participant joins a team to face difficult challenges. They must work together to solve problems on the map. The teams compete against each other to finish the course first. They race through the day and the night without stopping.

The course goes through a remote area. The teams enter a vast wilderness far from any cities. They navigate through thick forests and across high hills. The environment is wild and empty. However, the journey is often perilous for the racers. They face steep cliffs and fast water in the rivers. One bad step can be dangerous for the whole team. They must watch the ground carefully as they move.

This event is known as a test of endurance. The race covers hundreds of kilometers over several days. The athletes push their bodies to the limit. They hike, bike, and raft with very little sleep. They need great strength to keep going when they are tired. It is not just a physical game. It is a mental challenge for everyone involved.

Despite the pain, the runners enjoy the experience. They travel through some of the best scenery in the world. The views of the mountains are magnificent. They see snow on the peaks and green valleys below. The beauty of the land helps them forget their pain. Crossing the finish line is a proud moment for every racer.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The global trend of challenge travel has reached new heights this year with the launch of the "MAGNificent Adventure Race" in New Zealand. This grueling event beckons athletes from all corners of the globe to the rugged terrains of the South Island. It is designed for those who seek more than a simple vacation. Every participant must possess exceptional fitness and mental fortitude to handle the demands of the course. Teams compete fiercely against one another, but their true opponent is the unforgiving landscape itself.

The race route plunges deep into an untouched wilderness where modern civilization feels like a distant memory. Competitors must navigate through dense bush and rocky mountain passes using only a map and compass. The environment is beautiful but inherently perilous for the unprepared. Sudden storms and treacherous river crossings add a layer of genuine danger to the expedition. Safety teams monitor the area, yet the athletes must rely primarily on their own judgment and survival skills to remain safe.

At its core, this event is the ultimate definition of a test of endurance. The course stretches over hundreds of kilometers and requires continuous movement for several days. Sleep is a luxury that few teams can afford as they trek, mountain bike, and raft toward the finish line. The physical exhaustion is intense, often breaking the spirit of even the strongest competitors. Only those with unwavering determination can withstand the pressure of non-stop exertion.

However, the reward for this suffering is the visual splendor of the region. The course offers magnificent vistas that are inaccessible to the average tourist. As the sun rises over jagged peaks and illuminates the glacial valleys, the athletes witness nature in its most majestic form. This combination of extreme physical hardship and breathtaking beauty creates a unique allure. For these adventurers, the struggle through the wild is the most meaningful way to experience the world.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"participant","phonetic":"/pɑːrˈtɪs.ə.pənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"a person who takes part in or becomes involved in a particular activity"}]},{"word":"compete","phonetic":"/kəmˈpiːt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"to try to be more successful than someone or something else"}]},{"word":"wilderness","phonetic":"/ˈwɪl.də.nəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"an outside area where people do not live or farm and the land is in its natural state"}]},{"word":"perilous","phonetic":"/ˈper.əl.əs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"extremely dangerous"}]},{"word":"endurance","phonetic":"/ɪnˈdʒʊə.rəns/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"the ability to keep doing something difficult, unpleasant, or painful for a long time"}]},{"word":"magnificent","phonetic":"/mæɡˈnɪf.ɪ.sənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"very good, beautiful, or deserving to be admired"}]}]}}

News","sources":["https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/chinas-landspace-gears-up-take-elon-musk-spacex-2025-12-29/?utm_source=openai","https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/winter-storm-ezra-snarls-us-travel-meteorologists-warn-bomb-cyclone-2025-12-29/?utm_source=openai","https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2025/dec/29/heavy-snow-forecast-parts-uk-weather-warning-issued?utm_source=openai","https://www.theverge.com/news/850793/epilogue-sn-operator-super-nintendo-snes-cartridge-slot-backup-emulator?utm_source=openai"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Winter Storm Ezra hits airports, and many flights delay today. Travelers book an inn because roads turn icy in mountainous areas.

Officials give an official warning, so people check maps for safety. They visualize the storm path, and this news is the context.

In China, LandSpace tests rockets, and a spacecraft needs careful control. The firm seeks official approval, but holiday gamers watch new hardware.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Winter Storm Ezra snarled U.S. holiday travel on Dec. 29, and airlines reported widespread cancellations and long airport lines. In the UK, an official snow-and-ice alert pushed drivers off mountainous routes, and some visitors chose an inn over late-night roads.

Forecasters said the bomb-cyclone risk rose when temperatures dropped, so many travelers tried to visualize the storm track on apps. That context mattered for airlines and rail operators, who updated schedules after official briefings and local safety checks.

On the business front, Reuters reported LandSpace moved closer to reusable launches, positioning its spacecraft ambitions against SpaceX. The company still faced regulatory approval steps, while gamers tracked a new SNES cartridge tool that raised questions about official rights.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As Winter Storm Ezra swept across the United States, airlines cancelled flights and issued official advisories, leaving stranded passengers hunting for an inn near major hubs. In Britain, yellow snow-and-ice warnings highlighted how quickly conditions worsen on mountainous roads, a reminder that holiday mobility now depends on real-time risk communication.

Carriers and transport agencies, under pressure to avoid another cascading disruption, leaned on radar visuals to visualize banding and freezing rain as forecasts evolved. That context shaped decisions on de-icing crews and gate holds, and it also fueled debates over which official thresholds should trigger earlier public warnings.

Meanwhile in China’s commercial space sector, Reuters said LandSpace accelerated tests aimed at reusability, an effort that could lower launch costs for spacecraft customers. Any market listing or expanded production would still require regulatory approval, and executives have to court investors without overpromising on landing timelines. The day’s tech chatter extended to games, where a new cartridge reader revived old consoles on modern screens and, in legal context, stressed using only officially owned media.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"inn","phonetic":"/ɪn/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a small hotel or place to stay, often in the countryside"}]},{"word":"mountainous","phonetic":"/ˈmaʊn.tən.əs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"having many mountains; very hilly or high"}]},{"word":"official","phonetic":"/əˈfɪʃ.əl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adjective","definition":"approved or issued by an authority or government"},{"pos":"noun","definition":"a person with an important role in an organization or government"}]},{"word":"approval","phonetic":"/əˈpruː.vəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"permission or agreement that something is acceptable"}]},{"word":"context","phonetic":"/ˈkɒn.tekst/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"the background situation that helps explain an event or idea"}]},{"word":"visualize","phonetic":"/ˈvɪʒ.u.ə.laɪz/","definitions":[{"pos":"verb","definition":"to form a picture in your mind; to imagine clearly"}]},{"word":"spacecraft","phonetic":"/ˈspeɪs.kræft/","definitions":[{"pos":"noun","definition":"a vehicle designed to travel in space"}]}]}}

games are very popular today. Many people play them every day. The gaming business is growing fast. Chinese companies are doing well. They sell games to many countries. This success is now worldwide.

One famous entrepreneur makes mobile games. He has a very smart plan. His strategy is simple but good. He looks at what players like. He changes the game for them. This helps with user engagement. Players play for a long time. The game uses a fun mechanism. It makes the game easy to play.

The company also does good promotion. People see ads for the game. They want to try it. The game is now on top charts. It is famous in many regions.

Cities in China want to help. Guangzhou is a big city there. It gives solid support to game makers. The city makes new rules. These rules help the companies grow. The city wants to be a gaming center. They want to host big game events. This is good for the future. The industry is strong and healthy.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The gaming industry is becoming very strong in 2025. A new report shows that Chinese companies are important players. They are making a lot of money in overseas markets. This growth happens because of good planning.

A successful entrepreneur leads a top mobile game company. He understands how to sell products globally. His team uses a careful strategy for marketing. They look at local cultures in different countries. Then, they use this knowledge for better promotion.

The games are also very fun to play. They use a special mechanism that players enjoy. This keeps the user engagement very high. Because of this, their games are number one in many places. The company has achieved worldwide success this year.

The government also wants to help this industry. The city of Guangzhou is taking action. Officials are offering solid support to gaming companies. They have policies for research and new technology. They also want to host big esports tournaments. The goal is to make Guangzhou a famous hub for gaming. These efforts will help the industry grow for a long time.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"According to the latest industry reports from December 2025, the global gaming and esports sectors are experiencing significant expansion. Chinese enterprises are playing an increasingly vital role in this international market. Mid-year data indicates that mobile game developers have seen a substantial increase in overseas revenue.

This financial success is largely attributed to sophisticated market planning. A prominent entrepreneur in the mobile gaming sector has set a prime example. His company implemented a comprehensive strategy that integrates local cultural elements into their products. They also utilized a unique gameplay mechanism that resonates with diverse audiences. These innovations have successfully boosted user engagement levels, allowing their products to top sales charts in multiple regions.

Simultaneously, major cities are recognizing the economic potential of this sector. Guangzhou is currently introducing solid policies to support the esports industry. These measures cover various aspects, including technological innovation, game research, and export promotion. The city aims to establish itself as a worldwide center for digital entertainment and esports tournaments. By building a robust ecosystem, Guangzhou ensures sustainable growth and consolidates China's position in the global market. These initiatives demonstrate a clear commitment to the future of digital entertainment.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"mechanism","phonetic":"/ˈmek.ə.nɪ.zəm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"机制；原理；机械装置 (a part of a machine, or a set of parts that work together)"}]},{"word":"strategy","phonetic":"/ˈstræt.ə.dʒi/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"策略；战略 (a detailed plan for achieving success in situations such as war, politics, business, industry, or sport)"}]},{"word":"solid","phonetic":"/ˈsɒl.ɪd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"坚固的；可靠的；实质性的 (strong and certain, or not likely to change or fail)"}]},{"word":"engagement","phonetic":"/ɪnˈɡeɪdʒ.mənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"参与度；订婚 (the fact of being involved with something; the act of employing someone)"}]},{"word":"worldwide","phonetic":"/ˌwɜːldˈwaɪd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj./adv.","definition":"世界范围的；遍及全球的 (existing or happening in all parts of the world)"}]},{"word":"promotion","phonetic":"/prəˈməʊ.ʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"推广；促销；晋升 (activities to advertise something; the act of raising someone to a higher or more important position or rank)"}]},{"word":"entrepreneur","phonetic":"/ˌɒn.trə.prəˈnɜːr/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"企业家；创业者 (someone who starts their own business, especially when this involves seeing a new opportunity)"}]}]}}

Business","sources":["https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGunXdMZTEC8MAR1pgv18EtbybWw79YrEASvha8EcqYQrDf9HijN8EqkCyOB-vSEAUaPl2TsdNss9jKKpnvnN_12GrXD_oxNn4qtI7IZDReMUTocamIQIWgMKWAVE_1SjpRpuBOCrAXUcpf-aUPa-91AqGImH7h1NyG01m8nVEqHDS4La-sPErbc8knfxRNruOtHcWpMjoJiZKH6Cx-AFzE0p8W55AKLPCD2KM="],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The year 2025 is very special for technology. Artificial Intelligence is everywhere now. It is a new global phenomenon. This technology changes how we live and work. The world of electronics is moving very fast. Companies are building new and smart devices.

However, there is a big problem with computer parts. Officials made an important announcement today. They said there are not enough memory chips. Big computer centers need these chips for AI. This high demand changes the usual business cycle. Factories cannot make chips fast enough for everyone.

Because of this, the price of computers is going up. New products will have a time lag before they arrive. Shoppers feel some disappointment about the high cost. They must wait longer to buy what they want.

The gaming market is also very big this year. Games in China are making a lot of money. But it is not easy for the game makers. Many companies want to sell their games. They must compete hard to get new players. They need to make better games to survive.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The year 2025 has brought significant changes to the technology world. Artificial intelligence is now a common phenomenon in our daily lives. This powerful technology drives growth in the electronics industry. Companies are making better devices, but they face a difficult challenge.

A recent announcement warned about a serious shortage of memory chips. Big data centers need these chips to run AI programs. Because the demand is so high, the prices for parts are rising quickly. This situation changes the normal market cycle for manufacturers.

Customers are starting to feel the impact of these shortages. There is often a lag in product delivery because factories cannot work fast enough. These delays cause disappointment for people who want to buy new computers. The high prices also make it hard for regular shoppers.

At the same time, the gaming industry in China is growing fast. The market earned more than 350 billion yuan this year. However, the time for making easy money is over. Game companies must compete in a very tough environment. To succeed, they are creating games that use AI technology. This shows that the industry is becoming more advanced.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The technology and gaming sectors experienced a dynamic transformation in 2025. This shift is largely driven by the pervasive phenomenon of artificial intelligence. In the broader electronics field, industry reports highlight the rising popularity of advanced semiconductor technology. However, the industry faces a significant hurdle regarding supply chains.

An official announcement recently warned of an unprecedented shortage in memory chips. Prices for DRAM chips are soaring because AI data centers have huge demands. This reallocation of manufacturing power is challenging the traditional boom and bust cycle of the memory market. Consequently, higher costs and a potential product supply lag may lead to significant consumer disappointment.

Meanwhile, the Chinese gaming industry achieved remarkable growth in 2025. Market revenue exceeded 350 billion yuan, marking a major success. Despite this expansion, the era of quick profits appears to be over. Companies must now compete in an increasingly intense environment. They are turning to multi-platform games and AI-native content as new ways to grow. This indicates that the industry is moving toward more sophisticated development and operational strategies.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"electronics","phonetic":"/ɪˌlekˈtrɒnɪks/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"电子产品；电子器件；电子学"}]},{"word":"lag","phonetic":"/læɡ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"滞后；延迟；间隔"}]},{"word":"disappointment","phonetic":"/ˌdɪsəˈpɔɪntmənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"失望；扫兴；令人失望的人或事"}]},{"word":"announcement","phonetic":"/əˈnaʊnsmənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"公告；宣告；声明"}]},{"word":"cycle","phonetic":"/ˈsaɪkl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"周期；循环；循环期"}]},{"word":"compete","phonetic":"/kəmˈpiːt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"竞争；对抗；参加比赛"}]},{"word":"phenomenon","phonetic":"/fəˈnɒmɪnən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"现象；迹象；非凡的人（或事物）"}]}]}}

County has a new plan for winter. It is a big party for tourists. The theme of the party is the "Village Bowl". This event is fantastic for families and friends. Many people visit the town now.

They come here for the good food. The local meat has a special flavour. People sit at big round tables. They eat a traditional New Year feast. It is very tasty and hot.

Markets open in the busy streets. Many tasty dishes appear there. You can buy gifts at the market too. The streets look beautiful with lights. Everyone smiles and laughs together.

Visitors are inclined to walk around the village. They look at the historic buildings. The town has an old-fashioned style. It looks like a painting from long ago. It is very quiet and peaceful.

There are fun activities for everyone. You can learn about local arts. You can discover how the locals live. The people teach you many things. It is a warm experience in winter.

This winter is special in Yixian. The town is full of new life. It connects people with history. It is a great holiday trip.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Yixian County recently started a special winter tourism campaign to attract more visitors. The theme is the "Village Bowl," and it focuses on delicious food and customs. This fantastic initiative turns a simple sightseeing trip into a deep cultural experience. Visitors feel a strong connection to the local area during the cold season.

The highlight of the festival is the traditional New Year feast. Tourists can taste the unique flavour of local dishes like the "Year Pig Feast." These meals are famous in the region for their fresh ingredients. Many different plates appear quickly on the tables in the busy markets and "mobile banquet halls."

Travelers are inclined to participate in the local customs because they are so welcoming. They enjoy the lively atmosphere of the village markets. The setting is very beautiful and historic. They can see old-fashioned buildings that show the long history of Huizhou culture.

The event also offers interactive workshops for curious visitors. Guests can discover how to make traditional crafts with their own hands. This helps the town boost its winter tourism market successfully. It is a perfect mix of taste, history, and fun for everyone involved.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Yixian County has officially launched an innovative winter tourism campaign centered around the "Village Bowl" theme. This initiative aims to elevate the visitor experience by integrating local gastronomy with traditional folklore. By transforming sightseeing into an emotional journey, the county has created a fantastic opportunity for tourists to connect deeply with the region's heritage.

The core of this festival revolves around the authentic flavour of Huizhou cuisine. The celebrated "Year Pig Feast" serves as a major attraction for food enthusiasts from across the country. As visitors explore the vibrant New Year markets, various local specialties appear in the "mobile banquet halls," creating a festive and bustling environment that celebrates community spirit.

Tourists are increasingly inclined to immerse themselves in these rich cultural traditions rather than just observing from a distance. The festival encourages them to engage with the community and understand the roots of the New Year celebrations. This deep engagement helps revitalize the winter tourism market, which is often quiet in other regions during this season.

Amidst the modern festivities, the town retains its old-fashioned charm through well-preserved architecture and customs. The juxtaposition of lively markets against the backdrop of historic buildings creates a unique visual narrative. Visitors can appreciate the enduring legacy of the Huizhou lifestyle while enjoying the comforts of modern hospitality.

Furthermore, the event provides ample chances to discover intangible cultural heritage through hands-on workshops. Interactive experiences allow guests to learn traditional crafts, adding significant educational value to their leisure trip. Ultimately, Yixian's strategy successfully enhances its brand value while offering a heartwarming winter escape for all ages.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"fantastic","phonetic":"/fænˈtæstɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"极好的；了不起的"}]},{"word":"flavour","phonetic":"/ˈfleɪvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"味道；风味；特色"}]},{"word":"inclined","phonetic":"/ɪnˈklaɪnd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"倾向于...的；想要...的"}]},{"word":"appear","phonetic":"/əˈpɪr/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"出现；显现"}]},{"word":"old-fashioned","phonetic":"/ˌoʊldˈfæʃənd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"老式的；过时的；守旧的"}]},{"word":"discover","phonetic":"/dɪˈskʌvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"发现；发觉；了解到"}]}]}}

released a big report today. It is about the world's climate. The report shares many factual numbers. A sociologist helped write the text. The news is not very good. The progress is slow and disappointing. The earth is getting much warmer. We have a problem with air. Carbon emission levels are still high.

High heat can threaten all people. It hurts our farms and health. The weather is bad for nature. Animals are in danger right now. They lose their natural habitat. The report shows us the facts. The temperature is rising very fast. We must stop this bad trend.

This goal is very important.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"China recently published an important report called the Climate Change Green Book. This document includes factual data about our warming planet. A sociologist from a top university helped experts write this report. The findings show that the global temperature is rising quickly.

Many people feel this news is disappointing because the world is still getting hotter. The main cause of this heat is carbon emission from different industries. These gases trap heat and change the weather patterns everywhere. Extreme weather events now threaten agriculture and public health around the globe.

The report also notes that nature is suffering from these changes. Many animals are losing their natural habitat due to the high temperatures. China wants to lead the world in solving this difficult issue. The country has a plan to reduce pollution in the future. However, one country cannot fix everything alone. We need international cooperation to solve this environmental crisis. We must work hard to overcome these dangerous challenges together.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"China has officially released its Annual Report on Actions to Address Climate Change, also known as the Green Book. This comprehensive document provides factual evidence regarding the severity of global warming in 2025. The report was compiled by various experts, including a prominent sociologist from the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences. They revealed that global temperatures are now approximately 1.42 degrees Celsius higher than pre-industrial levels. Despite international efforts to follow the Paris Agreement, the lack of significant progress is disappointing to environmentalists.

The document highlights that the global energy landscape remains complex and unstable. Consequently, carbon emission rates continue to rise rather than fall. This ongoing trend creates extreme weather events that threaten global agriculture, cultural heritage, and human health. The report emphasizes that the crisis extends beyond human society into the natural world. Rising temperatures are destroying the delicate habitat of countless species, leading to biodiversity loss.

Although the situation appears grim, China remains committed to its environmental goals. The report outlines the nation's determination to achieve its dual carbon targets despite current economic difficulties. It serves as a call to action for the entire international community. The authors argue that nations must strengthen their cooperation immediately. Only through unified global action can humanity hope to overcome the escalating climate crisis before it is too late.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"factual","phonetic":"/ˈfæk.tʃu.əl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"事实的；真实的"}]},{"word":"sociologist","phonetic":"/ˌsoʊ.siˈɑː.lə.dʒɪst/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"社会学家"}]},{"word":"disappointing","phonetic":"/ˌdɪs.əˈpɔɪn.tɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"令人失望的"}]},{"word":"emission","phonetic":"/iˈmɪʃ.ən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"排放；排放物"}]},{"word":"threaten","phonetic":"/ˈθret.ən/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"威胁；恐吓"}]},{"word":"habitat","phonetic":"/ˈhæb.ə.tæt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"（动植物的）栖息地"}]},{"word":"overcome","phonetic":"/ˌoʊ.vɚˈkʌm/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"克服；战胜"}]}]}}

around the world work very hard. They want to stop bad crimes. In December, police caught many bad people. These people moved illegal things across borders. Police in different countries helped each other.

In Canada, police found many bad drugs. They found 137 kilograms of white powder. This was a very big haul for them. The drugs were worth four million dollars. Police put a truck driver in jail. In Australia, officers stopped a woman at an airport. She had drugs inside tea bags. She tried to hide the drugs. This is called drug trafficking.

Iran also stopped a big ship. This ship was in the Persian Gulf. The ship had a large cargo of fuel. The fuel was stolen oil. Police took sixteen men from the ship. They will stay in a prison.

Every government official is happy now. They want to protect their countries. They work to halt these bad crimes. The world is safer because of this work.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Law enforcement agencies across the globe recently completed several successful operations. These actions aimed to stop criminal networks from moving illegal goods. Police in Canada and Australia reported significant arrests during late December.

On December 25, Canadian authorities found a large amount of drugs. They seized 137 kilograms of suspected cocaine from a truck. This haul had a value of over four million dollars. Police arrested the driver of the vehicle immediately. Two days later, officers in Australia stopped a woman at Sydney International Airport. She tried to hide methamphetamine inside packages of tea. These events show the serious problem of drug trafficking today.

There was also major news from the Middle East region. The Iranian judiciary announced a successful operation in the Persian Gulf. They seized a foreign tanker that carried a massive cargo of smuggled fuel. The ship held four million liters of fuel illegally. Authorities detained sixteen crew members who were on the vessel.

A government official spoke about the importance of these coordinated efforts. These actions send a strong message to criminal groups. International agencies want to halt the movement of illegal substances. Countries will continue to work together to protect their borders.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"International law enforcement agencies have recently intensified their efforts to combat global organized crime. In late December, authorities in multiple countries executed successful operations to disrupt illegal supply chains. These coordinated actions resulted in significant seizures of narcotics and contraband fuel across different continents.

Canadian authorities reported a major success on December 25 when they intercepted a commercial vehicle. During the search, officers discovered a massive haul of suspected cocaine weighing approximately 137 kilograms. The estimated street value of these drugs exceeds four million dollars. Similarly, Australian Border Force officers apprehended a female traveler at Sydney International Airport. She attempted to smuggle methamphetamine which was carefully disguised as packets of tea. These incidents underscore the persistent global challenge of drug trafficking and the creativity of smugglers.

In a separate but equally significant operation, Iran’s judiciary announced a major maritime seizure in the Persian Gulf. On December 24, naval forces intercepted a foreign tanker carrying an illicit cargo of smuggled fuel. The vessel contained four million liters of fuel, representing a massive loss to the local economy. Authorities subsequently detained sixteen foreign crew members found aboard the ship for legal processing.

A high-ranking government official praised the dedication of the border protection teams involved in these cases. The primary objective of these strict measures is to halt the circulation of dangerous substances and illegal goods. These events reaffirm the international commitment to securing borders against complex criminal enterprises.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"haul","phonetic":"/hɔːl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"（尤指赃物或非法物品的）一大批；搬运"}]},{"word":"trafficking","phonetic":"/ˈtræfɪkɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"非法交易；走私活动"}]},{"word":"cargo","phonetic":"/ˈkɑːrɡoʊ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"（船或飞机装载的）货物"}]},{"word":"official","phonetic":"/əˈfɪʃl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"官员；行政人员"}]},{"word":"halt","phonetic":"/hɔːlt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"（使）停止；（使）中断"}]}]}}

is a very big company in South Korea. It sells many different things to people online. Recently, the company lost important data from its users. This is a very bad event for everyone. Coupang wants to fix this big problem soon. The company offers special compensatory tickets to its users. These tickets are for shopping on their website. They are not real cash for the people.

Many customers are not happy about this plan. They feel the plan is outrageous and unfair. The news does disappoint many loyal customers today. They wanted real money for the big mistake. They do not want to buy more things.

This event is now a famous news story. It is a scandalous story in the country. People talk about it in the streets. There is much gossip in the city now. Everyone asks why this happened to their data.

Some people think Coupang hides the real truth. They try to mask their plan with coupons. They hope people stay ignorant of the facts. This makes the customers feel very angry. Coupang must work hard to fix this trust.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Coupang recently announced a massive plan to pay its customers after a serious data leak. The company said it would provide funds worth over one billion dollars to the affected users. However, this compensatory offer has caused a lot of anger because it comes as coupons, not cash. Many people believe that Coupang is actually trying to force them to shop on the platform again.

Customers feel that the company’s response does disappoint them greatly during this difficult time. They think the idea of giving shopping vouchers for a privacy leak is simply outrageous. Critics say that the company is using this apology as a marketing trick. They argue that Coupang wants to mask its true intentions with a large amount of money.

The company hopes that the public will remain ignorant of the real nature of the deal. However, this strategy has backfired and created a negative reaction across the whole country. This event has become a scandalous topic in the Korean business world. There is now constant gossip among experts about how the company treats its private users. Coupang faces a difficult time as people demand a fair solution for their lost data.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"South Korean e-commerce giant Coupang is currently embroiled in a significant crisis following a massive data breach affecting millions of users. In an attempt to mitigate the damage, the company announced a compensatory package totaling approximately 1.3 billion dollars for the victims. However, the decision to issue this payment exclusively as shopping vouchers rather than cash has ignited a firestorm of criticism from consumer rights groups and the general public.

Many observers argue that this move is a calculated attempt to mask the severity of the privacy violation while boosting future sales. By forcing victims to spend the money within the Coupang ecosystem, the company effectively turns a crisis into a revenue-generating opportunity. Critics claim that the executives rely on the hope that customers will remain ignorant of the legal implications of accepting such a settlement. This strategy has only served to disappoint loyal users who feel their privacy was compromised for corporate profit.

The response from the community has been swift, with many describing the voucher scheme as an outrageous insult to consumer rights. What began as a security failure has evolved into a scandalous chapter in the company's history, raising questions about corporate accountability. Consequently, the incident has generated intense gossip within the tech industry regarding potential class-action lawsuits. As the situation unfolds, Coupang must navigate the complex challenge of restoring trust without alienating its massive user base further.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"mask","phonetic":"/mæsk/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"掩饰；遮盖 (to hide a feeling, smell, fact, etc.)"}]},{"word":"ignorant","phonetic":"/ˈɪɡnərənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"无知的；不知情的 (lacking knowledge or information)"}]},{"word":"compensatory","phonetic":"/kəmˈpensətɔːri/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"补偿性的；赔偿的 (intended to recompense someone for loss or suffering)"}]},{"word":"gossip","phonetic":"/ˈɡɒsɪp/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"流言蜚语；闲话 (casual conversation or reports about other people, typically involving details that are not confirmed as being true)"}]},{"word":"scandalous","phonetic":"/ˈskændələs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"丢脸的；丑闻的 (causing general public outrage by a perceived offense against morality or law)"}]},{"word":"disappoint","phonetic":"/ˌdɪsəˈpɔɪnt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使失望 (to fail to fulfill the hopes or expectations of someone)"}]},{"word":"outrageous","phonetic":"/aʊtˈreɪdʒəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"令人愤怒的；骇人听闻的 (shockingly bad or excessive)"}]}]}}

Every house near the road is bright. The area is safe and nice. It is a decent place to live. People enjoy the evening time. They go out to play. They find a place to rest. The city night is alive now.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Beijing finished a major lighting project in December 2025. This work focused on the Chaoyang section of the Third Ring Road. The city lit up the whole 17-kilometer line for the first time. In the past, this area had many problems because the lights were old. Some parts of the road were dark and broken. This caused visual ugliness at night. The government wanted to change this situation and improve the city's image.

Engineers installed new technology to fix the view. Now, the road looks like a beautiful corridor of light. A warm gold color is filling the air above the streets. This change connects the busy business district with quiet areas. It brings new energy to every house nearby. The old buildings look much better now.

The environment is safe and decent for everyone. Residents love the new atmosphere in their city. They have more space to enjoy their lives at night. Families can walk outside, meet friends, or simply take a rest. The night view in Beijing has become truly wonderful.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"In December 2025, Beijing successfully concluded a comprehensive illumination project along the Chaoyang section of the Third Ring Road. This ambitious urban upgrade marks the first time the entire 17-kilometer stretch has been fully lit. The initiative aimed to rectify previous infrastructure issues where insufficient brightness and outdated technology prevailed. Before the renovation, the fragmented lighting created patches of darkness that contributed to a sense of visual ugliness across the cityscape. The discontinuity of the lights often made the urban landscape feel broken and uninviting.

The transformation has been dramatic and visually stunning. Engineers have successfully linked the previously separated sections into a continuous, vibrant light corridor that guides traffic and pedestrians alike. A warm, golden glow is now filling the night sky, replacing the gloom with a sense of prosperity. This project does more than just beautify the international business district; it has injected fresh vitality into the older residential zones.

Light now reaches every house along the route, significantly improving safety and aesthetics. The renovation has fostered a more decent and habitable environment for the local community. Consequently, the residents have gained an expanded living space for their nocturnal activities. They can now utilize these revitalized areas to socialize or simply rest, enjoying the renewed charm of the capital's night scene.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"corridor","phonetic":"/ˈkɒrɪdɔːr/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"走廊；通道 (a long passage in a building or an area of land)"}]},{"word":"ugliness","phonetic":"/ˈʌɡlinəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"丑陋；难看 (the quality of being unpleasant to look at)"}]},{"word":"rest","phonetic":"/rest/","definitions":[{"pos":"v./n.","definition":"休息；停止 (to stop working or doing something to relax)"}]},{"word":"house","phonetic":"/haʊs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"房屋；住宅 (a building for people to live in)"}]},{"word":"filling","phonetic":"/ˈfɪlɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"充满；填充 (making something full; present participle of 'fill')"}]},{"word":"decent","phonetic":"/ˈdiːsnt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"体面的；像样的；得体的 (of a good enough standard or quality)"}]}]}}

is almost the end of 2025. The US government has a big problem. There is a serious congressional issue in Washington. Leaders must agree on a plan for money.

They need to pay for healthcare. But the money for this runs out soon. This causes a conflict between two groups. One group is the Republican party. The other group is the Democratic party. They do not agree on the rules.

Some people want to help. They formed a team to fix the budget. They tried to work together. But they did not succeed yet. This is bad news. It creates an emergency for the country. The government might have to close down.

One leader made a declaration about the vote. He wants to vote very soon. The people receive news about this every day. It is a stressful time. Everyone hopes they can fix the problem. They must act before the new year starts.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The year 2025 is coming to a close, but the United States government is facing a difficult week. A serious congressional debate is happening right now regarding the national budget. Lawmakers are arguing about spending priorities and healthcare laws. Specifically, important subsidies for the Affordable Care Act will expire soon.

This situation has caused a major conflict between the political parties. The Democratic party wants to extend the funding. However, a Republican leader often disagrees with this plan. They believe the current system allows for too much fraud. Some members tried to fix this divide. They built a bipartisan team to create a long-term spending bill. Sadly, their efforts were not successful.

Now, the government faces a financial emergency. If they do not agree on a budget, the government might shut down. This would be very bad for the economy. One aggressive lawmaker made a strong declaration recently. He said that Congress must vote immediately to extend the aid. The public continues to receive updates about the stalled negotiations. Everyone hopes for a solution before 2026 begins.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As the calendar turns to the final days of 2025, the political landscape in Washington remains incredibly tense. A significant congressional deadlock continues to dominate the headlines and threatens to disrupt the start of the new year. The primary source of tension involves critical budget negotiations and the imminent expiration of subsidies for the Affordable Care Act. This legislative battle has highlighted a deep conflict between the two major political parties regarding federal spending.

A typical Republican lawmaker argues that extending these subsidies without changes is fiscally irresponsible. Many conservatives claim the current healthcare system is filled with fraud and requires immediate reform. Conversely, Democrats insist the funding is vital for public health and safety. Attempts to bridge this philosophical divide have largely failed. A bipartisan team tried to draft a long-term spending bill, but they could not reach a compromise. Consequently, the nation now faces a potential emergency scenario where a partial government shutdown is possible.

In response to the dangerous stalemate, some aggressive representatives issued a formal declaration demanding an immediate floor vote. They want to force a decision on the healthcare funding extension before the deadline passes. Meanwhile, anxious citizens continue to receive conflicting reports from the media about the progress of the talks. The inability to resolve these fundamental issues suggests that deep political divisions will remain a major challenge for the country as it enters 2026.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"receive","phonetic":"/rɪˈsiːv/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"收到，接到；To get or be given something."}]},{"word":"republican","phonetic":"/rɪˈpʌblɪkən/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj/n","definition":"共和党的，共和党人；Relating to one of the two main political parties in the US."}]},{"word":"declaration","phonetic":"/ˌdekləˈreɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"宣言，声明；An official or public statement."}]},{"word":"team","phonetic":"/tiːm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"团队，组；A group of people working together."}]},{"word":"congressional","phonetic":"/kənˈɡreʃənl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"国会的，议会的；Relating to the US Congress (the group that makes laws)."}]},{"word":"conflict","phonetic":"/ˈkɒnflɪkt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"冲突，争执；A serious disagreement or argument."}]},{"word":"emergency","phonetic":"/iˈmɜːdʒənsi/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"紧急情况；A serious, unexpected, and often dangerous situation requiring immediate action."}]}]}}

is late in the year 2025. Computers are very smart now. New reports highlight big changes in technology. We call these computer brains AI. Many companies built new AI models this year. These models are excellent at thinking. They help people do many hard jobs.

China also makes strong AI tools today. These tools work very well. They cost less money to use. New computer helpers act like agents. They want to maximize speed at work. They can do tasks alone now. The models get a big enhancement often. This helps them perform better logic. They learn from rewards.

These systems read new information quickly. They help businesses everywhere in the world. Using AI is a sensible choice today. It is a big part of life. It changes how the world works.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"In 2025, the world sees amazing progress in artificial intelligence. Reports highlight the strong competition between big tech companies. New models like GPT-5.2 and Gemini 3 Pro show excellent skills in reasoning. They can solve hard problems and help with professional work.

Meanwhile, models from China are changing the global market. Tools like DeepSeek-R1 are very powerful and cost less money. We are also seeing a shift from tools to AI agents. These agents work to maximize efficiency in many industries. They do not just wait for commands, but they act on their own.

Scientists use new methods to improve these systems. Every enhancement helps the AI perform with better logic. They use a technique called RLVR to learn faster. These computers process a lot of information every day. They adapt to different situations easily. Because they are so useful, it is a sensible decision for companies to use them. This marks a new era for technology.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The technological landscape of 2025 is defined by rapid and significant advancements in artificial intelligence. Recent industry analyses highlight a fierce global rivalry among major developers regarding Large Language Models. Leading US models such as GPT-5.2 and Claude Opus 4.5 have demonstrated excellent capabilities in general reasoning and specialized tasks during benchmark tests.

Simultaneously, open-weight models from Chinese developers are reshaping the international hierarchy. Systems like DeepSeek-R1 are offering top-tier performance at a fraction of the cost. The sector is also witnessing a paradigm shift from passive tools to autonomous AI agents. These intelligent systems strive to maximize operational efficiency across various industrial sectors, including decision-making and driving.

Through innovative techniques like verifiable reward reinforcement learning, models undergo constant technical enhancement. This continuous improvement allows them to perform complex logical reasoning that rivals human intellect. These advanced systems possess the capacity to synthesize vast amounts of information rapidly and flexibly. Their adaptability makes them a sensible and integral component of modern infrastructure. This evolution signals a transformative moment in how humanity develops and deploys intelligent technology.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"maximize","phonetic":"/ˈmæksɪmaɪz/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"最大化；充分利用；使增加到最大限度"}]},{"word":"perform","phonetic":"/pəˈfɔːrm/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"执行；履行；表现；运转"}]},{"word":"enhancement","phonetic":"/ɪnˈhɑːnsmənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"增强；提升；改进"}]},{"word":"information","phonetic":"/ˌɪnfəˈmeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"信息；资料；情报"}]},{"word":"excellent","phonetic":"/ˈeksələnt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"优秀的；卓越的；极好的"}]},{"word":"sensible","phonetic":"/ˈsensəbl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"明智的；合乎情理的；切合实际的"}]},{"word":"highlight","phonetic":"/ˈhaɪlaɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"强调；突出；使显著"}]}]}}
