Webb Telescope Reveals New Cosmic Secrets","topic":"Space Exploration","sources":["https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGRGY3dZ4h4YkZA-IdnhMh3zyuxV--yuExr96fEOyBqpJabr1WRzN-eKXadrdZAWYpJYcPXTge7MPGsVAvJKlsVEPgx6Gg-CxnaZoauragjONwazBBr3vD4T4EDjqPslwfa9MF16p0HW22pQwUMk58Lz4HZxH0z4GQnB-4xoO3PPlMvGxJqFtzbm7h5WYQtbRivpEW2wYmQoeLXFxNsbDEZJAzhuojruXzDT9-JRbK8tB8J0jkorL9SPE14OwZF5MEkg9A-3zIFLJw17ipHYPOSWZMTpOUpDSZ8xSwKNTnOOix3th_evw3UCYxYlpOHtXNcmj3-lNHkRzfir5tdA="],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The James Webb Space Telescope looks at deep space.

It finds immense new things in the sky. Scientists use the telescope for planetary science. They are very happy with the new pictures. Webb found a special black hole this month. This black hole moves very fast through space. It leaves a long trail of new stars. We do not know everything about it yet.

The telescope also sees a very distant star. This star exploded a long time ago. It is the oldest explosion we can see. The time is an approximate 13 billion years. The universe was very young at that time. Scientists look at the light from the star. They can distinguish small details in the pictures. This helps them learn about old stars.

We have new conceptual ideas about the universe. The first stars are different than we thought. The telescope shows us the cosmic dawn. We learn more about space every day. The James Webb Telescope is a strong tool. It helps us see the dark corners.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed immense secrets about our universe this December.

These discoveries are very important for the future of planetary science and astronomy. One major finding is a supermassive black hole that moves quickly through space. It travels at millions of miles per hour and creates a long trail. This trail is full of new stars, but scientists do not understand it fully yet. The telescope allows us to see these strange objects clearly for the first time.

In addition, Webb found the most distant supernova that we have ever recorded. This massive explosion happened at an approximate time of 13 billion years ago. The universe was only a baby when this massive star reached its end. New technology allows researchers to distinguish small details in the light from the explosion. We can see how stars died during the early times of the cosmic dawn.

These new findings force scientists to change their minds about space history. We must update our conceptual models about how the first stars appeared. The telescope helps us see things that were once impossible to find. It continues to explore the ancient and extreme corners of the sky. We are learning more about the beginning of everything.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"In December 2025, the James Webb Space Telescope delivered immense new cosmic revelations that are fundamentally altering the field of astronomy.

These groundbreaking observations are significantly advancing planetary science and our general knowledge of the universe's complex structure. One of the most striking discoveries is the confirmation of a "runaway" supermassive black hole moving at 2.2 million miles per hour. This colossal object creates a galaxy-sized shockwave, yet scientists are still working to grasp the full implications of its behavior. The black hole leaves behind a wake that is 200,000 light-years long where new stars are born.

In addition to this dynamic object, the telescope has identified the most distant supernova ever recorded in history. This ancient explosion occurred an approximate 13 billion years ago when the universe was only about 730 million years old. The unprecedented clarity of the images allows researchers to distinguish fine details of stellar evolution during the cosmic dawn. Such detailed observations were previously impossible with older generations of space telescopes.

Consequently, astronomers must now re-evaluate their existing conceptual models regarding the formation of the earliest stars. The data suggests that the early universe was more active and complex than previous theories suggested. These findings underscore the telescope's unique ability to illuminate the darkest and most ancient corners of space. As the telescope continues its mission, it promises to uncover even more secrets about our origins.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"yet","phonetic":"/jɛt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"还，尚未；但是"}]},{"word":"approximate","phonetic":"/əˈprɒksɪmət/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"大约的，近似的"}]},{"word":"conceptual","phonetic":"/kənˈsɛptʃuəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"概念上的，观念的"}]},{"word":"immense","phonetic":"/ɪˈmɛns/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"巨大的，广大的"}]},{"word":"planetary","phonetic":"/ˈplænəˌtɛri/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"行星的"}]},{"word":"distinguish","phonetic":"/dɪˈstɪŋɡwɪʃ/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"区分，辨别"}]},{"word":"distant","phonetic":"/ˈdɪstənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"遥远的，久远的"}]}]}}

is the end of 2025 in China. Many towns hold parties for the New Year. People come together to celebrate with their neighbors. They want to create a happy start for 2026.

In Chengdu, the community holds a garden party. People play fun games in the park. I look at the happy crowd myself. New workers in the city join the group too. They feel welcome in their new home. We pause to watch them laugh and smile.

In Dalian, families cook food. They make dumplings for the party. Every kid helps the adults with the meal. They talk and laugh while they cook. The food tastes very delicious.

The party uses a small budget. It is a modest event. However, the feeling is wonderful. The day brings peace to everyone in the town. Neighbors smile at their friends. They keep in contact with others. This helps the community grow strong. Everyone is ready for the New Year.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The year 2025 is coming to an end across China. Local communities are organizing special events to celebrate the New Year. The main goal is to bring residents together in a happy environment. These events help people feel closer to their neighbors.

In Chengdu, the Randeng community held a garden party with games. Even new workers in the city joined the fun. I attended the event myself to see the excitement. It was wonderful to see people pause their busy lives for a moment. They laughed and played games in the park without worry.

Other cities had great events too. In Dalian, residents combined art and food. Every kid helped their parents make dumplings. While they cooked, they also learned how to stay safe from bad people. In Nanjing, people enjoyed beautiful flower arrangements.

These community events were simple and modest. They did not cost a lot of money to organize. However, they created a strong feeling of peace and joy for everyone. Community leaders keep in contact with the people to ensure everything goes well. This connection helps the neighborhood feel like a big family.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As the calendar turns towards the end of 2025, communities across China are fostering social cohesion through vibrant New Year celebrations. From Chengdu to Dalian, neighborhoods have organized diverse activities that bring residents together in a spirit of unity. In Chengdu’s Randeng community, a garden party titled "Galloping into the New Year" successfully integrated long-time residents with new employment groups.

As an observer, I found myself captivated by the genuine enthusiasm of the participants. In our fast-paced society, it is rare to see so many people pause and truly immerse themselves in collective joy. The atmosphere was filled with laughter as neighbors competed in festive games, strengthening their social bonds.

Meanwhile, the Green Garden community in Dalian took a practical and cultural approach. They combined artistic performances with interactive sessions on food and safety. It was heartwarming to see every kid in the room learning to wrap dumplings while listening to important anti-fraud tips. This unique mix of education and tradition deepened the friendship among neighbors.

Although many of these celebrations were organized with a modest budget, they successfully created a rich cultural experience. The events generated a profound sense of peace and belonging among the residents. The focus was on shared happiness rather than expensive decorations.

Behind the scenes, volunteers and administrators maintained close contact to coordinate these efforts. Their dedication ensured that the festivities ran smoothly. These initiatives remind us that strong community connection is the best way to welcome the coming year.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"myself","phonetic":"/maɪˈsɛlf/","definitions":[{"pos":"pron.","definition":"我自己"}]},{"word":"pause","phonetic":"/pɔːz/","definitions":[{"pos":"v./n.","definition":"暂停；停顿"}]},{"word":"kid","phonetic":"/kɪd/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"小孩；年轻人"}]},{"word":"peace","phonetic":"/piːs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"和平；安宁；平静"}]},{"word":"modest","phonetic":"/ˈmɒdɪst/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"适度的；谦虚的；简朴的"}]},{"word":"together","phonetic":"/təˈɡɛðər/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv.","definition":"一起；共同"}]},{"word":"contact","phonetic":"/ˈkɒntækt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n./v.","definition":"联系；接触"}]}]}}

have very good news today. They study nature every day. They uncover new life forms often. Many people think we know all animals. This is not true. Earth has abundant life everywhere. We do not know many plants yet.

Scientists demonstrate their hard work. They find 16,000 new types every year. This number is very big. It is bigger than the extinction rate. Scientists look in many places. They have great curiosity about the world. They use new tools now. They find a new creature easily.

Some animals look the same. But their genes are different. This work has a good effect. We can protect these new animals. We help them live safely in nature.

For example, scientists went to China. They found new frogs there. We must monitor the world. We look at forests and rivers. We learn more about our planet.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A recent scientific report brings exciting news about life on our planet. Scientists continue to uncover new species at a very fast speed. This trend surprises many experts because they thought discovery was slowing down. In reality, researchers identify over 16,000 new species every single year.

These findings demonstrate that Earth is still full of mysteries. Nature is abundant with unknown life forms that we have not seen yet. Experts predict that thousands of fish and plants are waiting for us.

Scientists use their strong curiosity to explore deep forests and rivers. They also use modern technology to look at genes. This helps them identify a new creature that looks similar to known animals. Without these tools, we would miss these hidden species.

This research has a positive effect on conservation efforts around the world. When we name a new animal, we can protect its home much better. For example, researchers recently found new types of amphibians in China. It is important to monitor biodiversity to understand our complex world. These discoveries might even lead to new medicines in the future.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Recent scientific studies have revealed a remarkable trend that challenges our understanding of the natural world. Scientists continue to uncover new species at an unprecedented pace, contradicting the popular belief that the era of biological discovery is ending. In fact, researchers currently identify more than 16,000 new species annually, a figure that significantly outpaces the rate of species extinction.

These findings clearly demonstrate that Earth's ecosystems are still incredibly diverse and largely unexplored. The planet remains abundant with unknown biological treasures, including tens of thousands of fish and amphibians. Furthermore, experts predict that more than half a million plant species are still waiting to be formally described by science.

Driven by an endless curiosity and aided by the rapid advancement of molecular tools, taxonomists can now see deeper into nature. These technologies assist in identifying a cryptic creature that may look identical to a known animal but is genetically distinct. This distinction is crucial for understanding the true complexity of the tree of life.

The most significant effect of this continuous discovery process lies in the realm of conservation. Identifying a species is the first step toward providing it with legal protection and preserving its habitat. A prime example occurred recently in the Chishui River basin in Guizhou, where scientists found three new amphibian species.

We must continue to monitor biodiversity to fully understand the complex web of life that supports us. Beyond their ecological value, these newly discovered organisms could potentially offer solutions for future medical breakthroughs and technological innovations.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"uncover","phonetic":"/ʌnˈkʌvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"发现；揭示 (to find something hidden or secret)"}]},{"word":"curiosity","phonetic":"/ˌkjʊəriˈɒsəti/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"好奇心 (a strong desire to know or learn something)"}]},{"word":"monitor","phonetic":"/ˈmɒnɪtər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"监控；监测 (to watch and check a situation carefully)"}]},{"word":"abundant","phonetic":"/əˈbʌndənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"大量的；充足的 (existing in large quantities)"}]},{"word":"effect","phonetic":"/ɪˈfɛkt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"影响；效果 (a change that is a result of an action)"}]},{"word":"creature","phonetic":"/ˈkriːtʃər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"生物；动物 (a living thing such as an animal)"}]},{"word":"demonstrate","phonetic":"/ˈdɛmənstreɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v.","definition":"证明；展示 (to show clearly that something exists or is true)"}]}]}}

He is 100 years old today. The first story comes from 1925. This bear is a classic character. People appreciate him very much. He lives in a forest with friends.

Children enjoy learning from Pooh. He is funny and kind. His adventures amuse boys and girls. The lessons are good for everyone. The themes are universal.

The books are educational too. They teach about friendship. Everyone loves this bear. He brings happiness to the world.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Do you know the world's most famous bear? On December 24, 2025, Winnie the Pooh turned 100 years old. People celebrated this special day globally. The first story appeared in a newspaper in 1925. A.A. Milne created this classic character for his son.

Readers learned to appreciate the bear's gentle nature. He lived in the Hundred Acre Wood. His adventures with Piglet and Eeyore were simple but meaningful. However, the books did more than just amuse the readers. They provided a space for learning about feelings. Children understood kindness through Pooh.

The themes of friendship proved to be universal. They crossed many borders and languages. Additionally, parents found the books educational. They helped children read and understand others. Winnie the Pooh remained a true icon of literature.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A century has passed since a honey-loving bear first captured the public imagination. On December 24, 2025, the world celebrated the 100th anniversary of Winnie the Pooh. This literary icon made his debut in a story published by the London Evening News on Christmas Eve, 1925. Since that moment, A.A. Milne’s creation has solidified its status as a true classic of British literature.

Generations of readers continue to appreciate the gentle adventures found within the Hundred Acre Wood. While the whimsical narratives primarily serve to amuse both children and adults, they possess deeper layers. The tales offer a valuable learning experience regarding social interactions. Critics often note that the texts are subtly educational, aiding in early literacy and emotional development without feeling like a formal lesson.

The appeal of Pooh and his companions is remarkably universal. The themes of unconditional friendship and simple wisdom resonate across diverse cultures and languages. As a result, the franchise has expanded far beyond the original books. Even after 100 years, the bear remains a symbol of kindness. His legacy proves that soft voices often speak the loudest truths in history.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"story","phonetic":"/ˈstɔːri/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"故事"}]},{"word":"classic","phonetic":"/ˈklæsɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"经典的；典型的"}]},{"word":"appreciate","phonetic":"/əˈpriːʃieɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"欣赏；赏识"}]},{"word":"learning","phonetic":"/ˈlɜːrnɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"学习；学问"}]},{"word":"amuse","phonetic":"/əˈmjuːz/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"逗乐；使消遣"}]},{"word":"universal","phonetic":"/ˌjuːnɪˈvɜːrsl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"普遍的；全世界的"}]},{"word":"educational","phonetic":"/ˌedʒuˈkeɪʃənl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"有教育意义的"}]}]}}

Animal Sanctuary starts the new year today. The group has great enthusiasm for its work. It is in a place called Summerland. They want new helpers now. The team does rescue work for animals. They make a special appeal to people.

Volunteers help cats and dogs every day. This work stops the loss of life. It is very effective for the animals. The boss is Lori Huot-Stewart. She is happy about the future.

You can ask for guidance by email. Please join their team. The animals need a safe home.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Critteraid Animal Sanctuary in Summerland welcomed the new year with hope. The organization showed great enthusiasm for the future. They wanted to find more volunteers for their important mission. Lori Huot-Stewart, the president, said the team was ready for new challenges.

They needed help with their rescue operations. As a result, they made a public appeal for kind people to join them. The shelter wanted to stop the loss of animal lives. New volunteers made the work more effective. People helped directly with animals or did other support jobs.

Everyone worked together to save pets. Interested people asked for guidance on how to join. They sent emails to the sanctuary for information. Additionally, the group created a safe home for abandoned animals. It was a very good start to the year for the community.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The Critteraid Animal Sanctuary in Summerland is entering the new year with renewed optimism and energy. As the calendar turns, the organization is launching a major campaign to recruit new volunteers. President Lori Huot-Stewart expresses significant enthusiasm about the future, noting that her team is prepared for both the challenges and the excitement that lie ahead.

This recruitment drive is vital for the sanctuary's ongoing rescue efforts. The organization aims to expand its workforce to ensure that operations remain effective in a challenging environment. By increasing their volunteer numbers, Critteraid hopes to prevent the unnecessary loss of innocent lives. They have issued a sincere appeal to the community, inviting anyone with a passion for animal welfare to apply.

The roles available at the sanctuary are diverse. Some volunteers will interact directly with the animals, while others may provide essential support behind the scenes. Regardless of the specific role, every contribution helps build a safe haven for abandoned creatures. The sanctuary believes that strong community involvement is the key to their long-term success.

Residents who are interested in this noble cause can receive specific guidance by contacting the sanctuary via email. The staff will provide details on the application process and necessary training. Through this collective effort, Critteraid plans to provide loving homes for animals in need throughout the coming year.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"enthusiasm","phonetic":"/ɪnˈθjuːziæzəm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"热情，热忱 (intense and eager enjoyment, interest, or approval)"}]},{"word":"rescue","phonetic":"/ˈreskjuː/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"营救，救援 (an act of saving or being saved from danger or distress)"}]},{"word":"guidance","phonetic":"/ˈɡaɪdns/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"指导，指引 (advice or information aimed at resolving a problem or difficulty)"}]},{"word":"appeal","phonetic":"/əˈpiːl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"呼吁，恳求 (a serious or urgent request, typically to the public)"}]},{"word":"effective","phonetic":"/ɪˈfektɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj.","definition":"有效的，起作用的 (successful in producing a desired or intended result)"}]},{"word":"loss","phonetic":"/lɔːs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n.","definition":"丧失，损失 (the fact or process of losing something or someone)"}]}]}}

China successfully launched the Tianwen-2 mission to collect samples from an asteroid. They also created DeepSeek R1, which is a very smart AI model. These achievements showed how China became a global pioneer.

The new technology included advanced electronics and powerful quantum computers. These modern tools promised to enable new ways of living for everyone. For example, passenger drones became a reality this year. Previously, this idea was seemingly impossible to achieve. However, Chinese scientists worked very hard to make it happen.

Experts said these changes would stimulate the economy significantly. Companies planned to use the new tech for faster products. The world began to grasp the true speed of China's growth. As a result, 2025 ended as a memorable year of great innovation.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"China has solidified its status as a global leader in innovation with a series of major breakthroughs announced on December 31, 2025. The nation released a comprehensive report detailing its mastery of cutting-edge technology. This official presentation highlighted successes ranging from the top-tier DeepSeek R1 artificial intelligence model to the Tianwen-2 asteroid sampling mission. By successfully launching Tianwen-2, China became only the third nation to complete such a complex feat in deep space exploration.

These innovations utilize sophisticated electronics to solve complex problems and improve daily life. The advancements will enable new industrial applications across various sectors. For instance, technologies like quantum computing and autonomous passenger drones have moved from theoretical concepts to tangible reality. Scientists have achieved what was seemingly impossible just a few years ago. As a pioneer in these high-tech fields, China is actively shaping the future landscape of global science and engineering.

Economic experts believe these technological developments will stimulate significant growth and encourage further research investment. The rapid pace of development demonstrates a strong scientific momentum that other nations are beginning to grasp fully. "This represents a new era of capability," stated a leading industry analyst regarding the report. As 2025 concludes, the seamless integration of advanced AI and space technology marks a transformative period for international technology standards.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"grasp","phonetic":"/ɡræsp/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"理解，领会"}]},{"word":"presentation","phonetic":"/ˌpreznˈteɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"展示，介绍，陈述"}]},{"word":"enable","phonetic":"/ɪˈneɪbl/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使能够，使可能"}]},{"word":"seemingly","phonetic":"/ˈsiːmɪŋli/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"表面上，似乎，看起来"}]},{"word":"stimulate","phonetic":"/ˈstɪmjuleɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"刺激，促进，激发"}]},{"word":"electronics","phonetic":"/ɪˌlekˈtrɑːnɪks/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"电子设备，电子器件"}]},{"word":"pioneer","phonetic":"/ˌpaɪəˈnɪr/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"先驱，开拓者"}]}]}}

Conservation","sources":["https://hk.news.yahoo.com/泰國再現罕見平頭貓30-年來首次發現-210000030.html"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Scientists find a very rare animal in Thailand. It is the Flat-headed Cat. People think this cat is gone for thirty years. Now, cameras see the animal again in the forest. This good news fascinates many animal lovers.

The cat looks a little odd to some people. It has a flat head and small ears. It likes the water very much. The cat catches a fish or a frog for its dinner. Researchers discover the cat in deep, wet forests.

The forest is very hard to walk in. The water is high and deep there. This special home must stay intact for the animals. It is a weird and special cat. Scientists want to save this family now.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Can a lost animal return after thirty years? In Thailand, scientists found the rare Flat-headed Cat again. It was missing from the country for a long time. However, new research in a wildlife sanctuary brought exciting news to the world.

Teams used special cameras hidden in the swamp forest. They managed to discover the cats living deep in the woods. The cameras even took photos of kittens. This proved that the cats were having babies there. These images fascinate the researchers because the cat is usually very shy.

This animal has an odd look compared to house cats. It hunts in water and often eats a fish or a frog to survive. Some people think its love for water is weird for a feline.

The researchers walked through dangerous wetlands to find them. They said the forest must remain intact to help the cats survive. If their wet home disappears, this rare species might vanish forever.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A rare species of feline has reemerged in Thailand, ending a thirty-year period where experts believed it was extinct in the region. Scientists recently confirmed the presence of the Flat-headed Cat in the Sirindhorn Peat Swamp Forest. This significant find continues to fascinate the global wildlife community, as the animal is one of the least understood cats in the world.

Researchers deployed camera traps to discover the elusive animals within the dense vegetation. The resulting footage provided the first photographic evidence of the species in decades. Remarkably, the cameras captured images of kittens, which indicates that a self-sustaining breeding population currently exists. This is a major breakthrough for conservationists who previously had little hope.

The Flat-headed Cat is unique among felines due to its specific adaptations. It possesses an odd appearance with a flattened skull and webbed toes. Unlike most cats, it hunts in wetlands and primarily consumes a diet of fish and frog species. Because of these weird behaviors, it thrives in difficult terrains where water levels can reach chest height.

Conservationists emphasize that the survival of this species depends entirely on the environment. The wetland ecosystem must remain intact for the population to recover. Habitat destruction remains a major threat to their future. This rediscovery provides a crucial opportunity to study and protect one of the world's most endangered cats.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"odd","phonetic":"/ɒd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"古怪的；奇特的"}]},{"word":"frog","phonetic":"/frɒɡ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"青蛙"}]},{"word":"weird","phonetic":"/wɪəd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"怪异的；不寻常的"}]},{"word":"intact","phonetic":"/ɪnˈtækt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"完好无损的；完整的"}]},{"word":"fascinate","phonetic":"/ˈfæsɪneɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使着迷；强烈吸引"}]},{"word":"discover","phonetic":"/dɪˈskʌvə(r)/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"发现"}]}]}}

A male fox named Seth lives there too. They are at ZooTampa in Florida. This is a very good place for them. Before this, they lived on a bad farm.

The old farm was dirty and odorous. The animals were sick there. However, Sadie and Seth are tame. They are not wild. They like people now. The zoo is a peaceful home for the pair. They are safe and healthy today.

A marine life expert helps the animals. Her name is Molly. The animals eat good food at the zoo. They chew on tasty treats. They play every day. This makes everyone happy.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Two red foxes named Sadie and Seth found a safe home. They arrived at ZooTampa at Lowry Park recently. Before this, they lived on a fur farm in Ohio. The conditions at the farm were very bad.

Rescuers saved hundreds of animals from that place. The air at the farm was very odorous because of the dirt. However, Sadie and Seth were lucky. Because they were born on the farm, they were already quite tame. They did not fear humans.

Molly Lippincott is a marine and wildlife curator at the zoo. She wanted to give the animals a second chance. The foxes needed a peaceful place to recover. They spent nearly one year in rehabilitation to get healthy.

Now, the pair enjoys life in their new habitat. Visitors watched them chew on food and play. They finally acted like normal animals. It was a wonderful change for them.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Two red foxes, Sadie and Seth, have found permanent sanctuary at ZooTampa at Lowry Park. They were rescued from a harsh fur farm in Ohio. After a long recovery process, the animals have finally settled into their new habitat. This move marks a significant improvement in their quality of life.

Previously, the pair lived in squalor among hundreds of other animals. Reports indicate the environment was notoriously odorous and unsanitary. These conditions caused severe neglect and illness for many creatures. Because they were born in captivity, Sadie and Seth remained relatively tame around humans despite their suffering. This trait assisted the rescue team during the evacuation.

Molly Lippincott, the senior curator of Florida and marine life at the zoo, emphasized the importance of the rescue. She stated that providing a second chance for these creatures is a vital part of their mission. The zoo offers a peaceful environment where the animals can continue to heal from their past trauma.

Following nearly a year of wildlife rehabilitation, the pair has adapted well. They now spend their days exploring their enclosure. Observers often see them chew on enrichment items and display natural behaviors. Their recovery highlights the ongoing efforts to protect wildlife from inhumane farming practices.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"fox","phonetic":"/fɑːks/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"狐狸"}]},{"word":"chew","phonetic":"/tʃuː/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"咀嚼，嚼"}]},{"word":"odorous","phonetic":"/ˈoʊdərəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"难闻的，有气味的"}]},{"word":"peaceful","phonetic":"/ˈpiːsfəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"宁静的，安宁的"}]},{"word":"tame","phonetic":"/teɪm/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"驯服的，温顺的"}]},{"word":"marine","phonetic":"/məˈriːn/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"海洋的（指海洋生物相关）"}]}]}}

Questioned","topic":"Technology","sources":["https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2025/dec/06/artificial-intelligence-research-slop-problem-academics"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A big problem exists in science today. A young man writes too many papers. His name is Kevin Zhu. This case worries many people. He works with students in high school. The number of papers is very high.

A famous educator speaks about this. His name is Hany Farid. He says the papers are bad. He says the work is not factual.

People ask for a clarification of the rules. They ask what is permissible in schools. AI acts like a doctoral student. But good science needs truth.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Scientists discovered a strange situation in the AI field last month. A researcher named Kevin Zhu claimed he wrote hundreds of papers in just one year. He worked with many high school students on these projects. This specific case shocked the academic world because the volume was impossible for a human.

An important educator named Hany Farid looked closely at the work. He is a professor at UC Berkeley. He said the papers were a disaster. He warned that the content was often poor and not factual.

The community asked for a clarification of the rules. They wanted to know what actions were permissible in research today. It became difficult to trust new studies because of the low quality.

AI technology is very powerful now. Some computer models even show doctoral level thinking. However, experts said humans must check every result. They want to protect the future of science.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The field of artificial intelligence is facing a significant challenge regarding the integrity of scientific output. A recent report highlighted a controversial case involving Kevin Zhu, a young researcher who claimed to produce over one hundred papers in a single year. Many of these were co-authored with high school students. This flood of content has alarmed experts who fear that the quality of research is declining rapidly due to mass production.

Hany Farid, a prominent educator at the University of California, Berkeley, offered harsh criticism of this trend. He described much of the work as a disaster and mere "vibes coding." He argues that such practices dilute the value of legitimate scientific discovery. This situation has prompted urgent calls for a clarification regarding academic standards. Institutions are now debating what research practices are permissible in an era where AI tools can generate text instantly.

The core issue lies in the growing ability of modern AI models. While some systems display reasoning capabilities comparable to a doctoral candidate, they often hallucinate information. Consequently, these models contribute to a surge of claims that appear authoritative but are not factual.

As submission numbers for major conferences skyrocket, the distinction between genuine breakthroughs and superficial work becomes blurred. Experts insist that rigorous peer review is essential to maintain trust in the scientific community.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"case","phonetic":"/keɪs/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"事例；具体情况 (文中指关于Kevin Zhu的具体事件)"}]},{"word":"educator","phonetic":"/ˈedʒʊkeɪtər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"教育工作者；教育家"}]},{"word":"factual","phonetic":"/ˈfæktʃuəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"事实的；根据事实的"}]},{"word":"clarification","phonetic":"/ˌklærɪfɪˈkeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"澄清；说明"}]},{"word":"permissible","phonetic":"/pəˈmɪsəbl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"允许的；许可的"}]},{"word":"doctoral","phonetic":"/ˈdɒktərəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"博士的；博士学位的"}]}]}}

Workers clean the mess soon.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A massive chemical spill occurred in Channelview, Texas, on December 27. Roughly one million gallons of sulfuric acid leaked from a facility. A large amount flowed into the Houston Ship Channel. This accident started when a walkway collapsed and broke the pipes.

Emergency teams arrived quickly to help the workers. Two people had breathing problems because of the bad air. They went to a local clinic for treatment. Additionally, doctors checked 44 other people at the site to ensure their safety.

Officials started to investigate the cause of the break immediately. They wanted to know the impact on the water and fish. Environmental experts also looked at the damage.

Locals felt fearful about the potential harm to nature. Many said the accident was regrettable because it polluted the water. It was disappointing to see such a dangerous event happen again. Crews continued to clean the area.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A significant industrial disaster unfolded in Channelview, Texas, where a massive infrastructure failure led to a hazardous chemical leak. On December 27, approximately one million gallons of sulfuric acid spilled at a BWC terminal facility. A portion of this corrosive liquid drained directly into the Houston Ship Channel after a collapsing walkway severed a crucial transfer pipeline.

The immediate health consequences were concerning for the workforce. Two individuals suffered respiratory distress and required transport to a medical clinic or hospital for urgent care. Furthermore, emergency personnel evaluated 44 other employees on-site. While no direct fatalities occurred, the exposure risks were taken seriously by medical teams.

Authorities have launched a comprehensive operation to investigate the full extent of the environmental damage. State officials and environmental experts are currently assessing how the acid might affect local marine life. Although there are no immediate reports of fish kills, the long-term ecological impact remains uncertain.

The community response has been emotional and critical. Residents are fearful that the chemical plume could harm the waterway permanently. Local leaders described the incident as regrettable, noting that such industrial failures endanger public trust. It is particularly disappointing given the recent efforts to improve safety standards in the region. As cleanup crews work to contain the spill, the focus shifts to prevention.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"acid","phonetic":"/ˈæs.ɪd/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"酸；酸性物质"}]},{"word":"fearful","phonetic":"/ˈfɪə.fəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"担心的；害怕的"}]},{"word":"clinic","phonetic":"/ˈklɪn.ɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"诊所；门诊部"}]},{"word":"regrettable","phonetic":"/rɪˈɡret.ə.bəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"令人遗憾的；可惜的"}]},{"word":"disappointing","phonetic":"/ˌdɪs.əˈpɔɪn.tɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"令人失望的"}]},{"word":"investigate","phonetic":"/ɪnˈves.tɪ.ɡeɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"调查；审查"}]}]}}

He scored over one hundred runs in just 62 balls for Mumbai. The game took place at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur. It was a very exciting day for all cricket fans.

More than 12,000 people filled the seats to watch the star. The ground was completely full. Some fans even climbed trees outside the walls to see him. Every listener heard the loud cheers from the happy crowd.

Rohit played with incredible fluency against the Sikkim team. The Sikkim bowlers were somewhat inexperienced compared to him. As a result, Rohit attacked them repeatedly. He hit the ball over the boundary line many times.

One specific shot was very powerful. He hit the ball completely out of the ground. A recording of this big hit became famous on the internet immediately. Everyone enjoyed watching his powerful skills in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Rohit Sharma has once again demonstrated his dominance in Indian domestic cricket. The star batter smashed a blistering century off just 62 balls during a Vijay Hazare Trophy match. Leading the Mumbai team, he secured an easy victory against Sikkim at the packed Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

The atmosphere at the venue was electric. Over 12,000 spectators filled the stands to capacity. The demand to see the world-class player was so high that many fans climbed nearby trees to catch a glimpse of the action. Every listener in the vicinity could hear the roar of the crowd as Rohit began his aggressive innings.

Rohit displayed his trademark fluency throughout the game. Facing a bowling attack that was somewhat inexperienced, he capitalized on every opportunity. He repeatedly launched the ball into the stands, hitting numerous sixes with effortless grace. His aggressive batting style left the opposition with few options to stop the run flow.

One particular moment captured the intensity of his performance. A video recording shows Rohit sweeping a ball so hard that it flew completely out of the sporting complex. This clip has since gone viral across social media platforms. His performance proves that he remains in top form as the cricketing year comes to an end.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"repeatedly","phonetic":"/rɪˈpiːtɪdli/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"反复地；再三地"}]},{"word":"fluency","phonetic":"/ˈfluːənsi/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（动作的）娴熟，流畅"}]},{"word":"stadium","phonetic":"/ˈsteɪdiəm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"体育场；露天大型运动场"}]},{"word":"recording","phonetic":"/rɪˈkɔːrdɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"录像；录音"}]},{"word":"listener","phonetic":"/ˈlɪsənər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"听众；倾听者"}]},{"word":"somewhat","phonetic":"/ˈsʌmwʌt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"稍微；有点"}]}]}}

The region is famous for its high mountains and deep valleys. It also has a beautiful coast next to the blue ocean. Although some areas looked plain and simple, they were very charming. Tourists naturally chose this spot for their vacations because of the unique scenery.

Officials said that winter tourism was a top priority for the government. They wanted the tourism sector to perform better than ever before. As a result, they added new projects to help local businesses grow.

The city worked hard to keep its strong reputation as a great winter destination.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Fujairah has successfully positioned itself as a premier winter destination, drawing global visitors with its diverse landscape and rich cultural offerings. The emirate, known for its rugged mountains and pristine valleys, offers a distinctive and grounded appeal. While the desert terrain may appear plain to the unobservant eye, it possesses a raw beauty that captivates explorers. Additionally, the stunning coast stretches along the ocean, providing a serene backdrop for those seeking relaxation.

Tourists naturally gravitate towards Fujairah during the cooler months to experience its unique environment. The mild winter climate allows for both extended stays and short weekend getaways comfortably. Consequently, the local hospitality sector has seen a significant boost in activity as people escape the hustle of city life.

Saeed Abdullah Al Samahi, the director of the Fujairah Tourism and Antiquities Authority, emphasized the strategic importance of this growing sector. He stated that developing winter tourism is a major priority on their national agenda. The authority is currently expanding its projects and partnerships to ensure that all tourism services perform at the highest possible level.

Furthermore, the government is placing the utmost importance on supporting local entrepreneurs and promoting heritage tourism. Hosts Global AI Summit","topic":"India Plans Big AI Meeting","sources":["https://www.guancha.cn/economy/2025_12_31_799981.shtml"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"India plans a big meeting about AI in 2026. This event happens in New Delhi. The leaders want a new declaration about technology safety. They invite every foreign counterpart to the city.

The group wants strong collaboration between nations. They want to transform how people use computers. There are persistent problems with AI safety today. They need preventive rules for the future.

Every country must agree on a compromise. This helps everyone work together. India wants good results from this summit. It is an important time for the world.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"India announced a major event called the AI Impact Summit. This meeting was scheduled for February 2026 in New Delhi. Officials invited China and other nations to join the discussion. Each government leader brought a technical counterpart to the talks. They wanted to discuss the future of technology together.

The organizers aimed for more than a symbolic declaration. Previous meetings in other cities were just the start. This time, the goal was practical action. They identified persistent challenges in the global tech industry. Therefore, they suggested preventive measures to stop bad outcomes.

India wanted to transform different sectors with new AI models. However, the leaders knew this required hard work. They needed strong collaboration to succeed. Additionally, every country needed to accept a compromise on the rules. This event marked a serious step for international safety. The world watched New Delhi closely for results.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"India is preparing to host the significant "AI Impact Summit" in New Delhi in early 2026. In a move that signals a desire for global unity, the Indian government has extended formal invitations to China and numerous other nations. This initiative marks a major step forward in international technology governance. Government officials and their technical counterpart from each invited nation will gather to debate the future trajectory of artificial intelligence.

The summit aims to surpass the results of previous conferences held in Bletchley and Paris. While those meetings produced a symbolic declaration, organizers in New Delhi are pushing for actionable policies. They emphasize that the world faces persistent challenges regarding diverse regulatory approaches. Consequently, there is an urgent need for preventive measures to mitigate the potential risks associated with advanced AI systems.

India intends to showcase its foundational AI models during the event. The host nation hopes to utilize this technology to transform various economic sectors. However, officials recognize that achieving a meaningful policy consensus requires significant diplomatic effort. Success depends on the willingness of all nations to reach a compromise on sensitive regulations.

Ultimately, the gathering highlights the growing realization that AI has no borders. Experts argue that managing these cross-border impacts demands sincere international collaboration. The outcome of this summit could define how the world governs intelligent systems for decades to come.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"counterpart","phonetic":"/ˈkaʊntərpɑːrt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（职能或地位）相当的人；对应的事物"}]},{"word":"preventive","phonetic":"/prɪˈventɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"预防性的；防止的"}]},{"word":"persistent","phonetic":"/pərˈsɪstənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"持续存在的；顽固的"}]},{"word":"transform","phonetic":"/trænsˈfɔːrm/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使彻底改观；使大变样"}]},{"word":"collaboration","phonetic":"/kəˌlæbəˈreɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"合作；协作"}]},{"word":"declaration","phonetic":"/ˌdekləˈreɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"宣言；声明"}]},{"word":"compromise","phonetic":"/ˈkɑːmprəmaɪz/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"妥协；折中"}]}]}}

now. It is a big role-playing game. You pretend to be a hero in this world. The journey feels immense and beautiful. Players build towns and find new friends.

The fighting part is fun and smart. You use a magic spell against monsters. Every move needs careful calculation to win. You can also choose a job variant for power. This helps your team fight better.

New information says the game is long. It has a fairy tale look. The art style is very special. This game makes many people happy.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Gamers welcomed a new title in December 2025. Octopath Traveler 0 arrived with a beautiful art style. It expanded on the previous games in the popular series. However, this game offered fresh features to fans.

Players created their own characters for the first time. They could pretend to be unique heroes in a deep story. The game also allowed them to build towns. The battles were the most exciting part. Players controlled eight characters at once. Victory required careful calculation during the fights. A hero cast a magic spell to defeat enemies. Additionally, gamers selected a specific job variant to make their team stronger.

Recent information showed the game was very long. The world was immense and full of secrets. The story included a classic fairy tale theme. Fans enjoyed this mix of old and new ideas.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The highly anticipated RPG, Octopath Traveler 0, officially launched in December 2025. This latest entry in the HD-2D series has captured the attention of the gaming community. It builds upon the foundation of its predecessors while introducing innovative mechanics that redefine the experience.

One major change involves player agency. Users can now design their own protagonist rather than selecting a pre-made one. This allows players to pretend they are truly part of the narrative. By building towns and recruiting over 30 characters, the sense of ownership over the world is significant.

The combat system remains a core highlight. The expanded eight-person battles demand precise strategic planning. Every turn requires careful calculation to exploit enemy weaknesses. Players must decide when to cast a powerful spell or utilize a specific job variant to gain the upper hand.

According to recent information, the game offers over 100 hours of content. The developers have created an immense world filled with folklore. The narrative weaves in a whimsical fairy tale atmosphere alongside serious themes. Ultimately, Octopath Traveler 0 is a triumph that successfully bridges nostalgia with fresh ideas.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"pretend","phonetic":"/prɪˈtend/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"假装，佯装（在此指扮演角色）"}]},{"word":"calculation","phonetic":"/ˌkælkjuˈleɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"计算；盘算（指战斗中的策略规划）"}]},{"word":"spell","phonetic":"/spel/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"咒语，法术"}]},{"word":"variant","phonetic":"/ˈveəriənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"变体；变形（在此指职业的不同分支）"}]},{"word":"fairy","phonetic":"/ˈfeəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"小仙子（fairy tale意为童话故事）"}]},{"word":"information","phonetic":"/ˌɪnfəˈmeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"消息，信息"}]},{"word":"immense","phonetic":"/ɪˈmens/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"巨大的，广大的"}]}]}}

Cities Celebrate the New Year","topic":"Global News","sources":["https://www.indianpressclub.com/london-new-year-eve-fireworks-2025-display-leads-global-celebrations/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"People celebrate the New Year all over the world. It is a special time for everyone. We take a pause to think about our lives. This event is a happy occasion for families.

Cities show good utilization of lights and technology. London has a big party on the river. In Asia, people ring a big bell for luck. These traditions help us say goodbye to the old year.

This event brings a collective hope to us. Every gathering is full of joy today. The world welcomes the new start with smiles. We are ready for the future together.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Cities around the globe celebrated New Year's Eve with spectacular events. It was a significant occasion that marked the end of 2025. Before the clocks struck twelve, many people took a brief pause to reflect on their lives and the past year.

In London, massive fireworks exploded over the Thames River. However, traditions were quieter in some parts of Asia. For example, temples in Japan and Korea rang a heavy bell to symbolize a fresh spiritual start. These customs are very important to local culture.

Event planners focused on the effective utilization of technology this year. They used drones and lasers to create amazing visual stories in the night sky. As a result, the displays attracted millions of tourists to city centers.

Every public gathering was full of energy and excitement. Despite global challenges, the crowds shared a collective wish for peace and success. The celebrations proved that people still value hope and unity.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As the final seconds of 2025 ticked away, the world engaged in a synchronized celebration of renewal. This annual phenomenon serves as a momentary pause in our busy lives, allowing for introspection amidst the chaos. From the dazzling pyrotechnics of London to intimate family dinners, this occasion remains a vital milestone for humanity, signaling the end of one chapter and the beginning of another.

Traditions varied significantly across borders, highlighting rich cultural diversity. While the West focused on visual spectacles, Asian nations maintained ancient customs to welcome the New Year. In Japan and Korea, the solemn sound of a temple bell resonated through the night, symbolically cleansing the spirit of last year's misfortunes and inviting good fortune.

Modern organizers have revolutionized how we celebrate through the strategic utilization of advanced technology. Cities deployed synchronized drones and eco-friendly lasers to craft immersive experiences for spectators. These innovations not only enhanced the visual appeal but also drew massive numbers of international tourists to urban centers, boosting local economies.

Beyond the spectacle, each public gathering represented something deeper than mere entertainment. In light of recent geopolitical shifts, these crowds demonstrated a powerful resilience. The events fostered a collective spirit of unity, proving that the desire for connection transcends borders. Ultimately, these global festivities highlight a universal human endurance and the shared hope for a brighter future.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"bell","phonetic":"/bɛl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"钟；铃 (一种通常由金属制成的中空物体，敲击时会发出响亮的声音)"}]},{"word":"utilization","phonetic":"/ˌjuːtələˈzeɪʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"利用；使用 (使某物发挥作用的行为)"}]},{"word":"collective","phonetic":"/kəˈlɛktɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"集体的；共同的 (由一群人共同完成或共享的)"}]},{"word":"pause","phonetic":"/pɔːz/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"暂停；间歇 (暂时的停止)"}]},{"word":"occasion","phonetic":"/əˈkeɪʒən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"重要时刻；盛会 (特殊的事件或时间)"}]},{"word":"gathering","phonetic":"/ˈɡæðərɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"聚会；集会 (一群人为了特定目的聚集在一起)"}]}]}}

nt","modest","wool","cargo","inclined","awareness","appear","scandalous","struggle","illustrative","stick","embarrassment","convenience","predictable","sustainability","bother","parallel","rock","currency","announcement","lag","freshman","trustee","stock","threaten","corridor","attributable","compensatory","overwhelm","rub","coarse","robbery","emphatic"],"selected":["discourage","poll","sadden","charity","sociologist","undermine"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"Poll Shows Fewer Donations","topic":"Social Issues","sources":["https://apnews.com/article/year-end-charitable-giving-poll-december-2025-norc-f5e6a8d7a12b4e8c9b9e6f8c7d6e5a4b"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A new poll shows a hard truth. Most people do not give money now. This happens at the end of 2025. Many groups rely on help from the public.

A charity uses money for good deeds. However, families save cash for their homes. This news might sadden the workers there. They need funds to help the poor.

A sociologist explains the reason for this. High costs discourage gifts from people. Money issues undermine the plans of groups. They hope for a change next year.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Most Americans did not plan to donate money at the end of 2025. A new poll by the AP-NORC Center revealed this trend in early December. While organizations hoped for support, few people opened their wallets during the holiday season.

Non-profit groups often rely on December gifts to finish their year. However, the lack of funds began to sadden those who work for the public good. A local charity struggled to meet its budget goals because donations dropped significantly compared to previous years.

Economic pressure seemed to discourage families from sharing their wealth. Instead of giving, people spent money on "Black Friday" sales. Additionally, rising costs for food and rent made it harder for regular people to help others.

One sociologist noted that financial stress continued to undermine the spirit of giving. The expert warned that this shift presented a serious challenge. Without enough public support, many groups faced a difficult future.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As 2025 comes to a close, the spirit of philanthropy appears to be waning across the United States. According to a recent poll conducted by the AP-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research, a majority of Americans have decided against making charitable donations this holiday season. This stands in stark contrast to the traditional end-of-year giving rush that non-profits heavily rely upon.

The data indicates a financial shift that will likely sadden community leaders and social workers. For many organizations, December is the most critical month for fundraising. When a charity fails to meet its year-end budget, it often forces distinct cuts to essential services that aid the vulnerable.

Several economic factors have combined to discourage potential donors. High inflation and shifting financial priorities have caused families to tighten their budgets. While retail shopping numbers remained high, donations saw a disappointing decline, suggesting that personal consumption has taken precedence over altruism.

Experts are currently analyzing the long-term effects of this trend. A prominent sociologist explained that prolonged economic uncertainty acts to undermine the public's capacity to give. The expert noted that when people feel financially insecure, their willingness to support external causes diminishes rapidly. Consequently, the non-profit sector faces a precarious future as it navigates these funding challenges.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"discourage","phonetic":"/dɪˈskɜːrɪdʒ/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"阻碍；打消……的念头"}]},{"word":"poll","phonetic":"/poʊl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"民意调查"}]},{"word":"sadden","phonetic":"/ˈsædn/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使悲伤；使难过"}]},{"word":"charity","phonetic":"/ˈtʃærəti/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"慈善机构"}]},{"word":"sociologist","phonetic":"/ˌsoʊsiˈɒlədʒɪst/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"社会学家"}]},{"word":"undermine","phonetic":"/ˌʌndərˈmaɪn/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"逐渐削弱；破坏"}]}]}}

dalous","struggle","illustrative","stick","embarrassment","convenience","predictable","sustainability","bother","parallel","rock","currency","announcement","lag","freshman","trustee","stock","threaten","corridor","attributable","compensatory","overwhelm","rub","coarse","robbery","emphatic"],"selected":["advisable","seldom","fruitful","creep","quotation","struggle","threaten"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"US Aid and New Rules for Gaza","topic":"Humanitarian Aid Politics","sources":["https://apnews.com/article/trump-un-humanitarian-aid-gaza-israel-8e6dc14b1b334cb78f9276357258583f"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The US government sends money to help people. Leaders want big changes to the system. It is advisable to make a new plan. Aid groups face hard times in Gaza. Success seldom happens in this area. Many families struggle to find food daily.

New rules threaten the safety of the workers. A fruitful result is difficult to see now. A news quotation explains the strict limits clearly. Bad ideas creep into the important work. The world watches this sad event today.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The US announced $2 billion for humanitarian aid recently. However, former President Trump warned agencies to change their methods. Additionally, Israel planned to stop some aid groups in Gaza by 2026. This situation caused worry about the crisis in the region.

Experts believed it was advisable to create better strategies. Sadly, successful aid delivery seldom occurred due to strict rules. The local people faced a daily struggle to survive. The restrictions made the work very hard for everyone involved.

Officials used a specific quotation to describe the problem. They worried that political ideas might creep into the aid system. They wanted to reduce unnecessary costs and delays. This statement showed their deep concern about the process.

These limits threaten the lives of many civilians. Agencies hoped for a fruitful partnership, but hope was low. The world waited to see if the aid would finally reach those in need.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The United States recently pledged $2 billion to United Nations humanitarian projects, but this financial commitment comes with strict conditions. Former President Trump warned that aid agencies must "adapt, shrink, or die." Simultaneously, Israel announced plans to suspend operations for several organizations in Gaza starting in 2026. Consequently, international observers argue that a new approach is advisable to navigate this complex political landscape.

Despite the funding, effective aid delivery seldom occurs due to severe border restrictions. Civilians in Gaza continue their daily struggle for basic necessities, while aid workers face immense bureaucratic hurdles. Critics suggest that these harsh bans threaten to collapse an already fragile support system. The situation remains dire as logistical channels are frequently blocked.

The US State Department highlighted these concerns in a formal statement. A key quotation from the document mentioned the need to stop ideological creep and reduce unnecessary costs. This language suggests a growing dissatisfaction with how current aid mechanisms function. Major donors are now demanding more efficiency and less political interference in humanitarian efforts.

Ultimately, the goal is to make these missions fruitful and effective. However, without cooperation between global powers and local authorities, the crisis may worsen. The international community is watching closely to see if these agencies can survive under such intense pressure.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"advisable","phonetic":"/ədˈvaɪzəbl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"Sensible and good to do in a particular situation; recommended."}]},{"word":"seldom","phonetic":"/ˈseldəm/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"Not often; rarely."}]},{"word":"fruitful","phonetic":"/ˈfruːtfl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"Producing good results; productive."}]},{"word":"creep","phonetic":"/kriːp/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"To develop or happen gradually and often unnoticed (referring to ideas or problems entering a system)."}]},{"word":"quotation","phonetic":"/kwoʊˈteɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A sentence or phrase taken from a book, speech, or writing that is repeated by someone else."}]},{"word":"struggle","phonetic":"/ˈstrʌɡl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"A very difficult task or situation that requires a lot of effort."}]},{"word":"threaten","phonetic":"/ˈθretn/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"To be likely to cause harm or damage to something; to put at risk."}]}]}}

Game Wins Top Global Award","topic":"Technology & Culture","sources":["https://www.nfnews.com/content/Y3Mp4Gvby1.html"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A game from China wins a big prize. Its name is Wuthering Waves. It wins the "Player's Voice" award. The game has a special visual style. It is very beautiful.

The game brings many people together. Players explore a large world. They do not lose interest in the story. The makers use a signature Chinese look. It has ink and dragons. This shows its originality to the world.

This win is good for China. It shows a cultural enhancement. Thus the game is famous now. The team is happy with the result. It is a great success.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A game from Guangdong won a major award at the 2025 TGA ceremony. Wuthering Waves received the "Player's Voice" title because fans loved it. The game became popular worldwide quickly. It showed a clear enhancement in Chinese game development capabilities.

The developers created a beautiful world for players. They used a stunning visual style with ink, bamboo, and dragons. The game had high originality because of these local elements. It mixed action with traditional Chinese culture perfectly.

Fans from many countries came together to play the game. They enjoyed the signature look of the characters and the world. However, the game market is very difficult today. Many good games can lose their audience easily. Wuthering Waves succeeded despite the fierce competition.

Thus, the game became a symbol of success for the region. It proved that Chinese stories are popular globally. The team worked hard to make this happen. Now, they celebrate this important victory.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The Chinese video game Wuthering Waves has secured a prestigious victory at the 2025 TGA ceremony. Developed by Guangdong-based Kuro Games, the open-world action RPG won the "Player's Voice" award. This achievement highlights the rapid enhancement of China's digital entertainment industry on the global stage. The game successfully blends modern mechanics with traditional aesthetics.

Critics and players alike praised the title for its unique presentation. The developers utilized a signature artistic style that incorporates ink washes, bamboo forests, and mythical dragons. These elements provide a high degree of originality that distinguishes the game from Western competitors. The team focused on the concept of "Xia" culture to create a deep narrative.

While other studios might lose their direction in a saturated market, Kuro Games stayed true to their vision. This dedication brought a massive community together across the globe. Players connect through the shared experience of exploring this distinctly Oriental world. The game design reflects a deep understanding of architectural beauty and martial arts history.

Consequently, the project serves as a bridge for cultural exchange. Thus, Wuthering Waves stands as a significant milestone for the region. It proves that local stories can resonate with international audiences. The developers have created a product that is both commercially successful and visually stunning. This win cements Guangdong's position as a powerhouse of creativity.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"thus","phonetic":"/ðʌs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"因此，从而"}]},{"word":"lose","phonetic":"/luːz/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"失去，丧失（兴趣、观众等）"}]},{"word":"together","phonetic":"/təˈɡeðər/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"聚集，在一起，共同"}]},{"word":"enhancement","phonetic":"/ɪnˈhænsmənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"增强，提升，改善"}]},{"word":"originality","phonetic":"/əˌrɪdʒəˈnæləti/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"独创性，创意，新颖"}]},{"word":"signature","phonetic":"/ˈsɪɡnətʃər/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"（此处作形容词）标志性的，具有鲜明特征的"}]},{"word":"visual","phonetic":"/ˈvɪʒuəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"视觉的，视力的"}]}]}}

We want a safe future for everyone.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Did you know that space is getting crowded? In 2025, the Secure World Foundation reviewed space safety. They looked at the growing number of satellites. Orbital debris was a major issue this year. Because of this, experts emphasized the need for better space sustainability.

Nations worked together to solve these problems. However, the political situation was difficult. Leaders knew that international coordination was necessary. They wanted to stop crashes in orbit. This required a lot of time and effort. It was a lengthy struggle to agree on new rules.

Scientists also created new ideas. They developed conceptual frameworks to manage traffic in the sky. These ideas focused on safety and peace. They wanted to make sure space remains open for everyone.

Ultimately, the goal was to help Earth. The report linked space safety to planetary health. A secure space environment benefits all of humanity. The work done in 2025 set the stage for a safer future.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The Secure World Foundation has released "Insight," a comprehensive retrospective on the state of outer space in 2025. This report highlights significant progress while addressing persistent challenges in the realm beyond Earth. As the year concludes, the sheer volume of active satellites and orbital debris underscores the critical importance of space sustainability. Without careful management, the congested environment poses a severe risk to future exploration and communication systems.

The foundation's analysis emphasizes that solving these issues requires more than quick fixes. Instead, lengthy strategic planning is essential to navigate complex geopolitical tensions. Additionally, robust international coordination has proven indispensable. Throughout the year, global powers engaged in extensive discussions to mitigate the dangers of orbital congestion and ensure responsible behavior among all spacefaring nations.

Innovation played a key role in these diplomatic efforts. Experts focused on developing new conceptual frameworks to tackle multifaceted challenges head-on. These intellectual models provide a roadmap for managing the delicate interplay between security and accessibility. The goal is to foster an environment where the peaceful use of space is the norm rather than the exception.

Ultimately, this mission extends beyond the vacuum of space. The report connects orbital safety to the broader management of planetary environments. By securing space, humanity protects vital systems on Earth. The ongoing efforts in 2025 have set a crucial stage for safeguarding the long-term viability of the cosmos for generations to come.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"planetary","phonetic":"/ˈplæn.ɪ.ter.i/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"行星的；（尤指）地球的 (relating to a planet, specifically Earth in this context)"}]},{"word":"coordination","phonetic":"/koʊˌɔːr.dənˈeɪ.ʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"协调；配合 (the act of making different people or things work together for a goal)"}]},{"word":"lengthy","phonetic":"/ˈleŋ.θi/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"漫长的；冗长的 (continuing for a long time)"}]},{"word":"conceptual","phonetic":"/kənˈsep.tʃu.əl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"概念上的；观念的 (based on ideas or principles)"}]},{"word":"sustainability","phonetic":"/səˌsteɪ.nəˈbɪl.ə.t̬i/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"可持续性；（环境或系统的）持续能力 (the quality of being able to continue over a period of time)"}]}]}}
