ion","outrage","semi-colon","buffet","counterpart","juice","gut","batch","fearful","weird","overcoat","enhance","heated","retail","exploitation","chew","recording","sociologist","knotty","guidance","case","loss","except","modesty","poll","fiber","hook","wrinkle","coordination","clinic","bell","vulnerability","grasp","fairy","ignorant","citation","corridor","discourage","heading","compromise","decent","deficient","modest","cousin","classic","reap","factual","appreciate","stimulate","conceptual","pretend","strategy","inclined","announcement","rescue","banana","coast","creep","permissible","darken","variant","curiosity","agriculture","rub","scandalous","sensible","old-fashioned","traditional","mister","restrict","distant","trafficking","shorts","annoyance","indicative","educational","melt","spell","hut","seemingly","ugliness","yet","fox","mouse","shuttle","coarse","creature","enthusiasm","pupil","poverty","filling","hereby","frustration","industrious","abundant","hall","raging","appear","bother","educator","advisable","ballet","electronics","peaceful","quotation","fluency","tower","frog","utmost","fascinate","persuasive","universal","tame"],"selected":["exploit","confident","process","reveal","consequence","investigation"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"Rainbow Six Siege Hit by Massive 'MongoBleed' Security Breach","topic":"Gaming & Cybersecurity","sources":["https://www.tomsguide.com/gaming/massiver-rainbow-six-siege-breach-reportedly-linked-to-mongobleed-flaw-everything-you-need-to-know"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Video gamers face a big problem today. Rainbow Six Siege has a dangerous security error. Hackers use an exploit to break into the game.

A security group finds the issue. They are confident in their report. The hackers follow a specific process to steal data. They reveal private information about the system.

The consequence is very bad for many players. Hackers ban some people and give money to others. An investigation begins now to fix this. This is a sad day for the game.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Did you hear about the massive hack in the gaming world? Recently, the popular game Rainbow Six Siege suffered a major security breach. Hackers successfully attacked Ubisoft's database using a serious flaw in the software.

A security research group called VX-Underground reported the shocking news. They felt confident that hackers used a specific exploit named "MongoBleed." This error allowed attackers to enter the system without a password. The hackers used a complex process to send bad data packets to the servers.

This attack helped them reveal hidden internal memory from the database. The consequence of this breach was severe for the gaming community. Hackers randomly banned innocent players and unbanned known cheaters. They even distributed billions in game currency to many accounts.

Ubisoft started an immediate response to the dangerous threat. A full investigation looked into how the breach happened. Experts worried that other organizations using MongoDB might face the same problem soon.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Ubisoft’s tactical shooter Rainbow Six Siege has fallen victim to a catastrophic security breach reportedly linked to the "MongoBleed" vulnerability. Reports indicate that unauthorized actors infiltrated the publisher's systems, causing chaos within the game's live service ecosystem.

The security research group VX-Underground originally broke the story regarding the incident. They remain confident that the intruders utilized an authentication-free flaw within the MongoDB database architecture. By manipulating network traffic, the attackers executed a specific process to trick the servers. This method allowed them to exploit the system effectively, accessing internal heap memory without requiring valid credentials.

The breach managed to reveal significant weaknesses in the game's backend infrastructure. Attackers sent malformed packets to the database, forcing it to leak sensitive internal information. This technical failure demonstrates how fragile modern game servers can be when facing sophisticated cyber threats.

For the player base, the immediate consequence was widespread confusion and frustration. Thousands of users were randomly banned or unbanned, while others received unauthorized in-game messages via the ban feed. Furthermore, hackers injected billions of credits into various accounts, potentially destabilizing the game's economy.

Currently, a comprehensive investigation is underway to determine the full scope of the attack. Security analysts fear this incident is not isolated. There is growing concern that other major organizations relying on MongoDB could be vulnerable to similar intrusions in the near future.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"exploit","phonetic":"/ˈeksplɔɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"(计算机) 漏洞利用；利用系统漏洞的程序"}]},{"word":"confident","phonetic":"/ˈkɒnfɪdənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"确信的；有信心的"}]},{"word":"process","phonetic":"/ˈprəʊses/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"过程；程序；步骤"}]},{"word":"reveal","phonetic":"/rɪˈviːl/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"揭示；透露；泄露"}]},{"word":"consequence","phonetic":"/ˈkɒnsɪkwəns/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"后果；结果"}]},{"word":"investigation","phonetic":"/ɪnˌvestɪˈɡeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"调查；审查"}]}]}}

Green Path Opens in Shanghai","topic":"Community & Nature","sources":["https://www.shobserver.com/news/detail?id=305602"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Shanghai opens a new green path for people. This local initiative improves the old community. Residents love the beautiful nature.

The path sits next to a kindergarten. It gives children a safe place to walk. Experts assist the residents with the plants. They do the gardening work together every week.

The flowers here are seasonal and very colorful. Every household can see the green trees now. Residents feel joyful about this nice change. The new path makes life much better.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Can a simple garden change a whole community? In Shanghai, a new project called the "Green Manxiang Road" opened recently. It quickly became a popular spot for many local residents.

This project was a special initiative by the neighborhood to improve the area. Residents wanted to make their home look beautiful. Professionals came to assist them with the design and planting. They carefully chose plants that were seasonal to ensure beauty all year round.

The path appeared right next to the Beisi kindergarten. In the past, traffic was very bad in this area. The new path solved this problem and provided safety. The shared gardening work also brought many neighbors closer together.

Every household near the path enjoyed the fresh green view from their windows. They felt joyful because they saw nature every day. This success showed how people can improve their city through teamwork.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Shanghai’s Xinjing Fourth Village has transformed an ordinary road into a vibrant ecological corridor. Known as the "Green Manxiang Road," this new landmark demonstrates how urban spaces can evolve through cooperation. The project began as a community autonomy initiative aimed at revitalizing the aging neighborhood environment through collective effort and shared governance.

Residents played a crucial role in this physical transformation. With professional guidance from the landscaping bureau to assist them, they selected specific flora for the area. The design focuses on seasonal vegetation, ensuring that the landscape remains colorful and evergreen throughout the year. This collaborative gardening approach not only beautified the street but also fostered a strong sense of ownership and pride among the participants.

Strategically located next to the Beisi kindergarten, the project serves a crucial dual purpose. It provides a scenic walkway while effectively relieving traffic congestion during peak school drop-off hours. The path offers a safe buffer zone for children and parents, separating them from the busy main roads.

The impact on the local community has been profound and immediate. Now, every household facing the street enjoys a view of lush greenery simply by opening their windows. Residents report feeling joyful and relaxed due to the improved environment. This successful model highlights how integrating nature into daily life can significantly boost public well-being.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"kindergarten","phonetic":"/ˈkɪndəˌɡɑːrtn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"幼儿园"}]},{"word":"gardening","phonetic":"/ˈɡɑːrdnɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"园艺；种植工作"}]},{"word":"seasonal","phonetic":"/ˈsiːzənl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"季节性的；应季的"}]},{"word":"initiative","phonetic":"/ɪˈnɪʃətɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"新方案；倡议"}]},{"word":"household","phonetic":"/ˈhaʊshoʊld/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"家庭；户"}]},{"word":"assist","phonetic":"/əˈsɪst/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"协助；帮助"}]},{"word":"joyful","phonetic":"/ˈdʒɔɪfl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"快乐的；喜悦的"}]}]}}

Governor Completes Annual State Tour","topic":"US News","sources":["https://vernonreporter.com/2025-roundup-gov-evers-completes-annual-72-county-tour-of-wisconsin/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Governor Tony Evers visits every county in Wisconsin. He finishes this tour for the sixth time. The residents witness his hard work during these trips. He talks to people to understand their lives.

The governor plans to fix an old tower in a park. Workers will construct a safe place for visitors. He also helps families with money for kids. He closes a large gap in funding for childcare services.

Cheese is a staple food in this state. New car plates generate extra money for roads. His ultimate goal is a good life for everyone.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Governor Tony Evers completed an impressive journey across Wisconsin last year. He visited all 72 counties for the sixth time to speak with locals. Residents across the state were able to witness his commitment to their needs. He listened to their stories and promised to solve their problems.

One specific action involved the famous Potawatomi Tower. The governor approved funds to construct a safer structure after the old wood rotted. This project showed his focus on repairing important local landmarks. However, infrastructure was not the only topic on his agenda.

Additionally, Evers addressed a serious financial issue for families. He secured $110 million to cover a funding gap in childcare services. This critical move helped parents stay in the workforce. Without this aid, many childcare centers faced closure.

Finally, the governor supported the dairy industry since milk is a staple of Wisconsin's economy. He also launched new license plates to generate millions for road repairs. His ultimate goal was to ensure prosperity for every community in the state.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":""Connecting with people where they are is the best part of my job," Governor Tony Evers stated after completing his annual tour of Wisconsin's 72 counties. This marks the sixth time the governor has traversed the state to witness local challenges and celebrate community achievements firsthand. His ultimate objective remains clear: to gather direct feedback that informs policy and drives statewide development.

A major highlight of the governor's recent efforts involves preserving the state's physical heritage. Following concerns over structural integrity, Evers approved emergency projects to reconstruct the Potawatomi Tower. The administration prioritized the decision to construct a durable observation platform, replacing the decayed wood that had forced the landmark's closure. This initiative reflects a broader commitment to maintaining the facilities that attract visitors to state parks.

In addition to infrastructure, the administration addressed a critical economic vulnerability regarding families. To prevent a collapse in services after federal aid expired, the governor secured $110 million to fill the funding gap in the childcare sector. This financial intervention ensures that childcare providers can remain open, allowing parents to participate fully in the workforce.

Furthermore, Evers continued to champion the dairy industry, which remains a staple of Wisconsin's economy. While supporting traditional sectors, he also looked for innovative revenue streams. The introduction of new license plates is expected to generate more than $25 million, providing essential capital for the state's transportation fund and road maintenance.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"ultimate","phonetic":"/ˈʌltɪmət/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"最终的，根本的"}]},{"word":"construct","phonetic":"/kənˈstrʌkt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"建造，修建"}]},{"word":"gap","phonetic":"/ɡæp/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"缺口，差距（尤指资金不足）"}]},{"word":"staple","phonetic":"/ˈsteɪpəl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"主要产品，主要部分"}]},{"word":"generate","phonetic":"/ˈdʒɛnəˌreɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"产生，创造（收益）"}]},{"word":"witness","phonetic":"/ˈwɪtnəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"见证，目击"}]}]}}

Food","sources":["https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/dec/27/grannies-catalan-chefs-preserving-traditional-cuisine"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Grandmothers in Catalonia are famous now. They join a new government project. They make videos about food. They want to teach young people.

Each woman acts like a chef in her kitchen. They use old recipes. They cook food on a hot stove. Sometimes they bake dishes in the oven. They use simple ingredients like apples and chicken.

The cooking needs gentle heat. It takes a long time. People love this traditional food. The project saves these special meals for the future.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Grandmothers in Catalonia recently became internet stars. The government launched a project called "Gastrosàvies" to save local food culture. They invited over one hundred older women to film their cooking methods.

Each woman was an amazing chef in her own home. They did not use fancy tools or modern science. Instead, they cooked on a simple stove using basic pots. They prepared classic dishes like chicken with apples.

Their methods focused on time and patience. The recipes often required gentle heat to cook the food slowly. They also taught viewers how to bake specific dishes perfectly. This style highlighted the natural taste of seasonal ingredients.

The goal was to protect traditional cuisine from disappearing. Modern life is fast, so people often forget these old recipes. However, this project ensured that the delicious history of Catalonia will remain for the next generation.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"In the culinary world of Catalonia, a significant shift is occurring away from modern molecular gastronomy. A new government initiative named "Gastrosàvies" has turned the spotlight on the region's oldest experts: grandmothers. This project aims to document and preserve the rich culinary heritage that risks fading away due to rapid urbanization.

The program features over one hundred senior women who share their vast knowledge on video. While none held a professional title in a restaurant, each woman operates as a master chef within her domestic sphere. They demonstrate how to maximize the flavors of humble, seasonal ingredients without relying on expensive equipment or artificial additives.

The techniques showcased are a testament to patience and respect for produce. Viewers watch as these cooks manage a simmering pot on a stove for hours. The process often involves using gentle heat to tenderize tough cuts of meat or taking the time to bake ingredients until they achieve the perfect texture. Dishes like rice with cabbage or chicken with apples are prepared with meticulous care.

This initiative is crucial because traditional cooking methods are becoming rare in fast-paced cities. By recording these recipes now, the project ensures that the wisdom of the past is not lost. It allows future generations to appreciate the authentic flavors that define Catalan culture.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"stove","phonetic":"/stoʊv/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"炉灶，火炉"}]},{"word":"gentle","phonetic":"/ˈdʒentl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"温和的；（火候）文火的"}]},{"word":"chef","phonetic":"/ʃef/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"厨师，主厨"}]},{"word":"bake","phonetic":"/beɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"烘烤，焙"}]},{"word":"traditional","phonetic":"/trəˈdɪʃənl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"传统的"}]}]}}

Trends in 2026","topic":"Technology","sources":["https://m.thepaper.cn/newsDetail_forward_32250602"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The metaverse changes fast in 2026. Some games are very big now. But other places see a big limitation with users. This tendency shows a split in the market today.

Fortnite hosts a special music festival. Fans love the new rhythmic games there. It is a principal spot for fun online. Millions of people play and sing together.

Tim Sweeney is the boss of Epic Games. He makes a remark about the future. He wants a uniform world for all players. He likes the integration of smart computer tools.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"At the end of 2025, the metaverse industry showed very mixed results. Some platforms grew quickly, but others faced a serious limitation regarding active users. This unequal growth revealed a clear tendency in the modern digital world.

However, companies actively planned for the new year. The principal hope for 2026 became the deep integration of AI and extended reality technology. Investors believed this powerful combination would fix many existing problems.

One major success story last year was the popular Fortnite Festival. This event featured rhythmic gameplay that was centered around famous music. It successfully attracted millions of players who wanted entertainment beyond standard games.

Tim Sweeney, the CEO of Epic Games, made a significant remark about these rapid changes. He emphasized the important need for cooperation between big companies. He wanted a uniform ecosystem where players could move freely between worlds. Although challenges remained, the industry looked forward to better technology.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"As the digital landscape transitions into 2026, the once-hyped metaverse industry presents a complex narrative of polarization. While select top-tier platforms have achieved record user engagement, a significant number of virtual worlds suffer from a severe limitation in retaining active participants. This sharp divergence highlights a prevailing tendency where only the most adaptable ecosystems survive, while static platforms fade away. Consequently, the principal focus for institutional investors has shifted toward the sophisticated integration of Artificial Intelligence and Extended Reality (XR).

A prime example of successful content adaptation is the Fortnite Festival. By pivoting away from pure combat to emphasize rhythmic experiences and music-based gameplay, Epic Games successfully captivated millions of fans. This strategic move demonstrates that high-quality, interactive content drives user retention much more effectively than empty virtual real estate.

Amidst this evolving backdrop, Tim Sweeney, the CEO of Epic Games, issued a thought-provoking remark regarding the industry's future trajectory. He argued that the current fragmented landscape impedes true growth and advocated for the creation of an open metaverse. His vision involves distinct companies collaborating to build a uniform infrastructure that allows assets and avatars to travel freely across borders.

However, achieving this seamless interoperability remains a formidable challenge. Developers are currently struggling to merge legacy systems with cutting-edge user demands effectively. Despite these hurdles, the collective drive to overcome every technical limitation remains strong, setting the stage for a potentially transformative year in digital interaction.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"rhythmic","phonetic":"/ˈrɪðmɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"有节奏的；合拍的"}]},{"word":"tendency","phonetic":"/ˈtendənsi/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"趋势；倾向"}]},{"word":"integration","phonetic":"/ˌɪntɪˈɡreɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"结合；整合；一体化"}]},{"word":"uniform","phonetic":"/ˈjuːnɪfɔːm/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"统一的；一致的"}]},{"word":"principal","phonetic":"/ˈprɪnsəpl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"主要的；首要的"}]},{"word":"remark","phonetic":"/rɪˈmɑːk/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"评论；言论"}]},{"word":"limitation","phonetic":"/ˌlɪmɪˈteɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"限制；局限"}]}]}}

has a big winter party. It is the famous Newport Winter Festival. This event brings fun to everyone in February.

An observer watches artists make ice art. They build a beautiful ice monument. The festival initially starts with only locals. Now it offers a novel activity for tourists. Everyone likes the new games.

Visitors also go to a local winery. They try drinks with a sweet berry taste. The food is very good too. Winter is a happy time in this city.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The northeastern region of the US prepared for a special season in early 2026. The 38th Annual Newport Winter Festival welcomed many guests. This celebration brought light and joy to the cold month of February.

The festival initially began as a small community gathering. However, it grew larger over the years. The organizers introduced a novel attraction for the new year. This ensured that returning visitors experienced something fresh and exciting.

Crowds gathered to watch the ice sculpting competition. Each observer looked in amazement at the skilled artists. The sculptors turned simple blocks of frozen water into a stunning monument of art. These temporary statues captured the beauty of winter.

Tourists also explored the local food scene. Many people visited a nearby winery for warm tours. They tasted unique drinks with a strong berry flavor. The trip offered a perfect mix of art and culture.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Residents and tourists in the northeastern United States are embracing the chill as the highly anticipated 2026 cultural season begins. The focal point of this excitement is the 38th Annual Newport Winter Festival, scheduled to captivate audiences from February 13th to 22nd. This ten-day event promises to transform the coastal region into a vibrant hub of activity, defying the quiet usually associated with winter.

Although the festival initially started as a modest gathering intended for locals, it has evolved significantly over nearly four decades. Organizers continue to implement novel ideas and attractions to keep the schedule fresh. This strategy ensures that even long-time attendees find something unique and surprising to enjoy each year.

One of the most stunning events involves professional ice sculpting demonstrations. Every observer stands captivated as artists diligently chip away at massive frozen blocks. Within hours, they create a sparkling monument that reflects the winter sun. These ephemeral masterpieces draw photographers and art lovers who appreciate the fleeting beauty of the medium.

Beyond the visual arts, the region is actively highlighting its culinary strengths. A local winery will invite guests for exclusive tours and tastings during the festival period. Guests have the opportunity to sample diverse blends, including exquisite berry flavored wines that pair perfectly with the cold weather. This combination of outdoor artistry and indoor comfort defines the Newport experience, proving that winter is an inviting time for exploration.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"berry","phonetic":"/ˈberi/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"浆果（文中用来形容水果口味）"}]},{"word":"initially","phonetic":"/ɪˈnɪʃəli/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"最初，开始时"}]},{"word":"observer","phonetic":"/əbˈzɜːrvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"观看者，目击者"}]},{"word":"novel","phonetic":"/ˈnɑːvl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"新颖的，新奇的"}]},{"word":"northeastern","phonetic":"/ˌnɔːrθˈiːstərn/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"东北部的，来自东北方的"}]},{"word":"monument","phonetic":"/ˈmɑːnjumənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"纪念碑；（文中指宏伟的）雕塑作品"}]},{"word":"winery","phonetic":"/ˈwaɪnəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"酿酒厂，葡萄酒庄"}]}]}}

The Year Space Travel Changes","topic":"Space Exploration","sources":["https://www.forbes.com/sites/kevinholdenplatt/2026/01/01/space-startup-aims-to-genetically-enhance-astronauts-for-mars-odysseys/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The year 2026 is a big time for space. Many adventurous people want to leave Earth. Several independent companies build big new rockets now. They work with NASA to go far away.

These companies use smart machines to work very fast. They plan to mechanize the heavy work. This helps reduce the high price of tickets. New tools also protect travelers from dangerous cosmic rays.

One company changes human genes for trips to Mars. This news brings astonishment to the whole world. Humans travel very deep into space today.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"The year 2026 marked a major milestone for human exploration. People called this era the "Second Space Age." Several independent companies led this charge alongside NASA. They wanted to make space travel normal for everyone.

These businesses had a clear goal for the future. They worked hard to reduce the high cost of flights. Additionally, they began to mechanize their production lines. As a result, they created advanced rockets that flew many times.

However, deep space remained dangerous for the human body. Adventurous astronauts faced risks from strong energy outside Earth. A startup named BioAstra found a new way to help. They used science to protect crews from harmful cosmic rays on the way to Mars.

The world watched these changes with deep interest. There was astonishment regarding the genetic plans. Humanity started to explore the universe like never before.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The year 2026 has emerged as a pivotal moment in history, frequently referred to as the dawn of the "Second Space Age." Unlike previous eras dominated solely by government agencies, independent commercial entities like SpaceX and Blue Origin are now driving the industry forward. Their ambitious collaboration with NASA signals a significant acceleration in humanity’s quest to reach beyond Earth.

To make these dreams a reality, engineers have worked tirelessly to modernize infrastructure. Their primary objective is to reduce the astronomical financial barriers associated with spaceflight. By developing reusable launch vehicles and choosing to mechanize complex assembly systems, these companies are finally democratizing access to orbit. The ultimate goal is to increase flight frequency while lowering the price for private citizens.

However, the most radical innovation targets the biological limits of the explorers themselves. BioAstra, a cutting-edge startup, recently proposed a controversial method to aid adventurous astronauts. They aim to genetically enhance humans to withstand the harsh environment of deep space. This technology is specifically designed to counter the deadly effects of cosmic rays during long voyages to Mars, a challenge that standard shields cannot easily solve.

These rapid advancements have been met with global astonishment. While the concept of altering human genetics sparks ethical debates, the technological progress is undeniable. With next-generation rockets and commercial space stations now operational, civilization is poised to explore the universe more deeply than ever before.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"independent","phonetic":"/ˌɪn.dɪˈpen.dənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"独立的；私营的（不依赖政府的）"}]},{"word":"mechanize","phonetic":"/ˈmek.ə.naɪz/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"使机械化；用机器做"}]},{"word":"cosmic","phonetic":"/ˈkɒz.mɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"宇宙的；外层空间的"}]},{"word":"adventurous","phonetic":"/ədˈven.tʃər.əs/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"爱冒险的；大胆的"}]},{"word":"astonishment","phonetic":"/əˈstɒn.ɪʃ.mənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"惊讶；惊奇"}]},{"word":"reduce","phonetic":"/rɪˈdʒuːs/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"减少；降低（价格、成本等）"}]}]}}

Hits Washington Farms","topic":"Environment","sources":["https://agbizcenter.org/flood-support-for-western-washington-farms/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A big flood hits Western Washington. It brings trouble to the Green River. The water rises very high. Farmers see water everywhere on their land.

Many farmers suffer from this bad event. Their fields are below fifteen feet of water. They lose every important asset. They lose their crops and big machines.

Even a historic farm has heavy damage. The water destroys the farmers' livelihood. A local group helps these people now. They need support to work again.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Recent weather caused a terrible situation in Western Washington. A massive flood struck the area and damaged many agricultural sectors. This happened specifically along the Green River, where the water rose quickly. The river overflowed and covered the land with mud and debris.

Farmers in the region began to suffer immediately from the damage. Their fields and houses were soon below fifteen feet of water. The famous Razzano Farm faced huge problems during the storm. The water destroyed almost every valuable asset on their property. This included their seasonal crops and expensive equipment.

The disaster also hurt a historic place in the community. The destruction of the land threatened the farmers' livelihood significantly. They could not work or sell their goods to earn money. However, people started to help. The Northwest Agriculture Business Center offered support to the victims. They knew the farmers needed resources to recover their businesses.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Severe weather patterns recently devastated the agricultural sector in Western Washington. A catastrophic flood swept through the region, causing profound damage to communities situated along the Green River. The deluge was indiscriminate, destroying infrastructure and leaving vast areas of farmland submerged.

Local farmers continue to suffer as they assess the full extent of the destruction. Reports indicate that at the Razzano Farm, land and buildings sit below fifteen feet of water. This extreme flooding has wiped out nearly every physical asset necessary for operations, including seasonal crops and critical machinery. The financial impact is staggering for families who rely on the land for their income.

The event is particularly tragic because it affects the region's heritage. Even a historic farm, which has stood for generations, could not withstand the force of the water. Consequently, the farmers' livelihood is now at risk. Without their equipment and soil, they cannot generate income or prepare for the next season.

In response to this crisis, the Northwest Agriculture Business Center is coordinating relief efforts. They are actively mobilizing resources to assist those who have lost everything. Organization leaders emphasize that the recovery process will be long and difficult. They are urging the broader community to provide aid, noting that these unexpected losses are heartbreaking right before the holidays.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"river","phonetic":"/ˈrɪvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"河流"}]},{"word":"livelihood","phonetic":"/ˈlaɪvlihʊd/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"生计；谋生手段"}]},{"word":"asset","phonetic":"/ˈæset/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"资产；财产"}]},{"word":"flood","phonetic":"/flʌd/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"洪水；水灾"}]},{"word":"historic","phonetic":"/hɪˈstɔːrɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"历史上著名的；有历史意义的"}]},{"word":"suffer","phonetic":"/ˈsʌfər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"遭受；蒙受（痛苦或损失）"}]},{"word":"below","phonetic":"/bɪˈloʊ/","definitions":[{"pos":"prep","definition":"在…下面"}]}]}}

Mystery","sources":["https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/trump-amelia-earhart-declassification-a9254336.html"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Former President Trump gives a new order today. It concerns Amelia Earhart. She is a famous woman in aviation history. She disappears on a flight in 1937. Her plane vanishes over the ocean.

The government holds many old papers about her. These records remain secretive for a long time. Trump wants to uncover the real truth. He starts a fresh investigation into the mystery. This helps us understand the story.

Her missing plane is a strange phenomenon. People hope the files reveal what happens. The world wants to know the answer. This news excites many people. Everyone waits for the new report.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Former President Trump ordered the declassification of government files regarding Amelia Earhart. She was a famous pioneer in aviation who disappeared in 1937. Her plane vanished over the Pacific Ocean during a flight around the world.

For many decades, the government kept these specific records secretive. However, Trump decided to uncover the hidden information. He believed the public deserved to know the full truth. This major decision quickly started a conversation about the famous mystery.

The unexplained loss of Earhart became a global phenomenon over time. Many explorers tried to find her plane, but every investigation failed to find her. The mystery continued for nearly a century because there were no clear answers.

Experts hoped the new documents would reveal what actually happened to her and her navigator. The release of the files provided a fresh chance to finally solve the case. The world waited eagerly to see the contents of the report.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Former President Trump has reportedly ordered the full declassification of all government records concerning the disappearance of Amelia Earhart. This significant directive aims to finally resolve the mystery surrounding the legendary aviation pioneer who vanished in 1937. The move represents a major shift in transparency regarding historical intelligence.

For decades, these specific documents remained secretive, locked away within federal archives. By choosing to release them now, Trump intends to uncover details that were previously hidden from the public eye. Officials stated that this action is designed to end speculation and provide clarity on a case that has puzzled the world for generations.

The unexplained disappearance of Earhart and her navigator has evolved into an enduring cultural phenomenon. Although the US government launched an extensive investigation immediately after she went missing, no conclusive evidence was ever found. Consequently, countless theories have emerged, ranging from a simple fuel exhaustion crash to capture by foreign military forces.

Historians and researchers widely anticipate that these declassified files will reveal critical flight data or diplomatic cables. While a definitive answer is not guaranteed, the fresh information could radically change our understanding of her final moments. This event offers a unique opportunity to close the book on one of history's greatest unsolved puzzles.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"secretive","phonetic":"/ˈsiːkrətɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"遮遮掩掩的；守口如瓶的；（此处指文件）保密的"}]},{"word":"aviation","phonetic":"/ˌeɪviˈeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"航空；飞行"}]},{"word":"uncover","phonetic":"/ʌnˈkʌvər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"揭露；发现；揭示"}]},{"word":"reveal","phonetic":"/rɪˈviːl/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"显示；透露；揭示"}]},{"word":"investigation","phonetic":"/ɪnˌvɛstɪˈɡeɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"调查；审查"}]},{"word":"phenomenon","phonetic":"/fəˈnɒmɪnən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"现象；（此处指）引起轰动或广泛讨论的人事物"}]}]}}

Ninagawa's Digital Art Exhibition at Kyoto Shrine","topic":"Art & Culture","sources":["https://www.shoppingdesign.com.tw/post/view/10008"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Mika Ninagawa Opens Art Show in Kyoto

Mika Ninagawa opens a new art show in Kyoto. It happens at the old Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. This place shows the idea of permanence. The shrine is very famous and beautiful.

Lights shine in the garden. The air looks misty and soft. A bright light beam cuts through the dark. Many crystal pieces hang on the trees. Some parts stand upright on the ground. The colors change with the light.

The show has a musical sound too. It mixes nature and art. This inclusion makes the art special. Visitors enjoy the lights and the history.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Art and Light Transform an Ancient Shrine

Japanese artist Mika Ninagawa organized a stunning exhibition in Kyoto. The event began in February 2026 at Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. This ancient location represented history and permanence. The art team transformed the old grounds into a magical world.

The main garden looked misty and mysterious. Over one thousand crystal pieces hung from the plum trees. They caught the light beautifully. Additionally, visitors walked past upright art pieces. A bright light beam shone through the darkness and guided the guests along the path.

The organizers also planned a special show. It featured a musical performance. This sound experience helped the audience feel deep emotions. It was the first time the shrine hosted such a modern event.

The goal was the inclusion of art within nature. Technology and tradition came together perfectly. As a result, people experienced the historic shrine in a completely new way.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"Kyoto Shrine Hosts Immersive Digital Art Exhibition

Renowned artist Mika Ninagawa and the creative team EiM are set to unveil a spectacular exhibition at Kyoto’s historic Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. Starting in February 2026, the event titled "KYOTO NIPPON FESTIVAL 2026" blends contemporary art with ancient tradition. The shrine, which has stood for over a millennium, provides a backdrop of cultural permanence for this modern display.

The exhibition features a mesmerizing installation known as the "Garden of Light and Flowers." By manipulating shadows and illumination, the artists have created a misty and ethereal atmosphere within the plum grove. Over a thousand crystal ornaments hang from the branches, interacting with the changing environment. These are complemented by upright visual structures that guide visitors through the grounds. Occasionally, a sharp light beam cuts through the scene, adding a dynamic layer to the sensory experience.

For the first time in the shrine’s history, the event includes an immersive theater production. This performance incorporates a distinct musical component, allowing the audience to lose themselves in the narrative. The project emphasizes the inclusion of advanced technology within a traditional setting. By merging digital art with the natural landscape, Ninagawa aims to let visitors transcend time and appreciate Japanese aesthetics from a fresh perspective.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"upright","phonetic":"/ˈʌpraɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"直立的；垂直的"}]},{"word":"misty","phonetic":"/ˈmɪsti/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"朦胧的；雾濛濛的"}]},{"word":"permanence","phonetic":"/ˈpɜːrmənəns/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"永久性；持久"}]},{"word":"beam","phonetic":"/biːm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（光）束"}]},{"word":"musical","phonetic":"/ˈmjuːzɪkl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"音乐的"}]},{"word":"inclusion","phonetic":"/ɪnˈkluːʒn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"包含；融入"}]},{"word":"crystal","phonetic":"/ˈkrɪstl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"水晶（制）的"}]}]}}

Education","sources":["https://www.washingtonea.org/initiatives/parental-rights-and-trans-athletes-initiatives/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A group in Washington starts a new plan. This group is active in local politics. They have a new initiative for schools. The plan is for the 2026 election. It is about boys and girls in sports.

The plan talks about gender rules. Some people do not like this idea. They say it makes a student feel like an outsider. Teachers want to stop this plan. They say the rules hinder kindness in schools.

Groups confront each other about the laws. They address the problem now. Everyone waits for the vote. The debate is very big.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"In Washington State, a group called "Let's Go Washington" started a big debate. They proposed a new initiative for the 2026 election. This plan wanted to change rules in public schools. It quickly became a major topic in state politics.

The proposal focused on two main things. First, it wanted to address parental rights regarding school information. Second, it aimed to stop students born as male from joining girls' sports teams. This part of the plan focused heavily on gender identity and biological sex.

However, many people did not like these ideas. Teachers and families argued that the new rules would hinder efforts to be inclusive. They worried that transgender students might feel like an outsider at school. They said the rules could hurt mental health.

Opposing groups decided to confront the supporters of the measure. They fought against the changes to protect student privacy. The state faced a difficult choice regarding these educational laws.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A conservative organization known as "Let's Go Washington" has launched controversial proposals that are reshaping the landscape of state politics. These measures, which constitute a significant initiative, are scheduled to appear before the Legislature or on the November 2026 ballot. The group seeks to modify laws regarding parental rights and restrict the participation of transgender athletes in female sports categories.

The proposed legislation specifically aims to address concerns regarding biological sex in athletic competitions. Under the new rules, students identified as biologically male would be prohibited from competing in girls' sports. Supporters argue this protects fairness, while opponents claim it targets vulnerable youth based on their gender identity.

Critics, including the Washington Education Association, argue that these measures will hinder progress toward inclusivity in public education. They believe that requiring verification of biological sex could violate privacy and cause significant distress. Furthermore, advocates warn that such policies effectively treat transgender students as an outsider within their own learning communities.

Consequently, coalitions like "Washington Families for Freedom" have mobilized to confront the conservative group. They emphasize that the proposals could damage the dignity and mental health of students. As the state prepares for the legislative session, the debate highlights the deepening divisions over how schools should handle sensitive social issues.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":7,"used_count":7,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"gender","phonetic":"/ˈdʒɛndər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"性别"}]},{"word":"outsider","phonetic":"/ˌaʊtˈsaɪdər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"局外人；外人"}]},{"word":"politics","phonetic":"/ˈpɒlɪtɪks/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"政治；政治活动"}]},{"word":"hinder","phonetic":"/ˈhɪndər/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"阻碍；妨碍"}]},{"word":"address","phonetic":"/əˈdrɛs/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"处理；设法解决"}]},{"word":"initiative","phonetic":"/ɪˈnɪʃətɪv/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"新方案；倡议"}]},{"word":"confront","phonetic":"/kənˈfrʌnt/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"对抗；面对"}]}]}}

rcial","presentation","clinic","gardening","credibility","solidify","irrational","gadget","corridor","compel","pierce","derivative","faint","continuation","poll","equivalence","knotty","kindergarten","seemingly","gut","preventive","acidity","anticipate","sadden","household","appeal","regrettable","vocabulary","uniform","confident","utmost","drug","odorous","repeatedly","distant","generate","permissible","drill","indicative","somewhat","utilization","profound","thousand","consequence","initially","dropout","weird","curriculum","assist","confrontation","frog","heir","counterpart","negotiable","modesty","rhythmic","chef","staple","speculation","observer","bake","principal","pretend","fluency","chew","fairy","rub","cousin","overcome","exemplary","exploit","bother","adverb","deprive","charity"],"selected":["sail","amidst","accidental","coast"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":4,"used_count":4,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"Tragedy Strikes Valencia Coach in Indonesia","topic":"Sports / World News","sources":["https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/valencia-coach-fernando-martin-dies-indonesia-boat-accident-2025-12-28/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A sad accident happens in Indonesia this week. A boat sinks near the coast of Padar Island. A football coach is on the boat. His name is Fernando Martin. He works for Valencia. He is with his family.

They sail on the water for a holiday. The weather is very bad. The boat tips over in the sea. It is an accidental tragedy. Eleven people are on the boat. The water is dangerous.

Rescue workers look for the people. They find Martin's wife alive. Sadly, the coach and three children die. The world feels sad amidst this bad news. Football teams cry for the family.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A tragic boat accident occurred near Padar Island in Indonesia this week. Fernando Martin, a famous Valencia football coach, died in the water. He planned to sail around the beautiful islands with his family for a holiday.

However, the weather became dangerous very quickly on December 27. The boat carried eleven people when it tipped over near the rocky coast. This accidental event caused Martin and his three children to fall into the sea. It was a frightening moment for everyone on board.

Rescue teams worked hard amidst the big waves to find the victims. Fortunately, they saved Martin's wife, one daughter, and the boat crew. The search was difficult because the ocean conditions were extremely rough and the visibility was poor.

As a result, the football world is in shock today. Teams like Valencia and Real Madrid sent messages of love to the family. Everyone is sad about this terrible loss during what should have been a happy trip.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The sporting community is in deep mourning following the sudden death of Valencia coach Fernando Martin in a maritime disaster. On December 27, a recreational vessel carrying the coach and his family capsized near the picturesque coast of Padar Island, Indonesia. This heartbreaking incident has claimed the lives of Martin and three of his children during what was meant to be a relaxing holiday trip.

The family intended to sail through the popular tourist destination, but extreme weather conditions quickly turned the excursion into a nightmare. Authorities report that the boat, which carried eleven passengers, overturned in the strait due to high waves. While the capsizing has been ruled as accidental by local police, the severity of the storm made immediate escape impossible for some passengers.

An extensive search and rescue operation was launched immediately amidst the chaotic sea conditions. Although the marine environment was challenging, rescue personnel successfully retrieved Martin's wife, another daughter, a guide, and four crew members. Tragically, the bodies of the coach and the three other children were recovered after a desperate search.

This tragedy highlights the unpredictable nature of maritime travel, especially during periods of volatile weather. Major football clubs, including Valencia CF and Real Madrid, have issued statements expressing their profound sorrow. The loss casts a dark shadow over the football world as fans remember the coach's legacy.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":4,"used_count":4,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"sail","phonetic":"/seɪl/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"乘船航行；驾驶船只"}]},{"word":"amidst","phonetic":"/əˈmɪdst/","definitions":[{"pos":"prep","definition":"在……之中；在……包围下"}]},{"word":"accidental","phonetic":"/ˌæk.sɪˈden.təl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"意外的；偶然发生的"}]},{"word":"coast","phonetic":"/koʊst/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"海岸；沿海地区"}]}]}}

ning","credibility","solidify","irrational","gadget","corridor","compel","pierce","derivative","faint","continuation","poll","equivalence","knotty","kindergarten","seemingly","gut","preventive","acidity","anticipate","sadden","household","appeal","regrettable","vocabulary","uniform","confident","utmost","drug","odorous","repeatedly","distant","generate","permissible","drill","indicative","somewhat","utilization","profound","thousand","consequence","initially","dropout","weird","curriculum","assist","confrontation","frog","heir","counterpart","negotiable","modesty","rhythmic","chef","staple","speculation","observer","bake","principal","pretend","fluency","chew","fairy","rub","cousin","overcome","exemplary","exploit","bother","adverb","deprive","charity"],"selected":["supreme","compensation","environmentalist","process","consequence"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"US Supreme Court Reviews Climate Case","topic":"Environment / Law","sources":["https://todayville.com/us-supreme-court-has-chance-to-end-climate-lawfare/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"The United States Supreme Court looks at a big new case. A city in Colorado sues large oil companies. The city wants money from them. This money is compensation for damage to the weather and land. The companies say this is not right. They think federal rules are more important than local rules.

An environmentalist group supports the city. They want to protect the earth. They say the companies cause big problems for the climate. However, the legal process is very long. The oil companies want to stop these lawsuits.

This case has a big consequence for everyone. The judges decide the rules for the whole country. This changes how cities can sue companies in the future. It is a very important story for the energy industry.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Can a city sue an energy company for climate change damages? The United States Supreme Court faced this difficult question recently. Boulder, Colorado, filed a lawsuit against big oil companies like ExxonMobil and Suncor. The city wanted financial compensation because the companies produced carbon emissions. Officials claimed these emissions caused damage to the local climate.

However, the energy companies argued strongly against this idea. They said that federal laws were more important than state laws regarding emissions. An environmentalist lawyer noted that this case was about legal control. Critics called the lawsuits "climate lawfare." They believed the judicial process was not the right way to force changes in energy prices.

The judges considered if the Federal Clean Air Act blocked these state claims. Their final decision had a serious consequence for future lawsuits across the country. If the court stops this case, other cities cannot sue oil companies easily. It was a major moment for environmental law in America.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The United States Supreme Court is currently evaluating a pivotal case that could terminate a wave of climate litigation against fossil fuel giants. Specifically, the city and county of Boulder, Colorado, have sued major corporations like Suncor Energy and ExxonMobil. The plaintiffs are seeking substantial compensation for damages attributed to carbon emissions and the resulting climate change.

At the heart of this legal battle is a complex jurisdictional dispute. The defendants argue that the federal Clean Air Act preempts state-level public nuisance claims regarding interstate emissions. Critics describe these lawsuits as "climate lawfare," suggesting that plaintiffs are utilizing the judicial process to manipulate energy prices rather than relying on federal regulations. Conversely, a prominent environmentalist associated with the Boulder legal team argues that local communities deserve restitution for environmental harm.

The potential ruling carries a significant consequence for the relationship between federal and state authority. If the justices decide to hear the case and rule in favor of the energy companies, it would effectively block similar lawsuits nationwide. This would affirm that federal agencies, not state courts, hold the primary jurisdiction over emission standards.

As the nation watches, the high court's decision will determine the future of environmental liability. The outcome will clarify whether the judiciary or the legislature is the appropriate venue for addressing the global climate crisis.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"supreme","phonetic":"/suːˈpriːm/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"（权力、级别或地位）最高的，至高无上的"}]},{"word":"compensation","phonetic":"/ˌkɒmpenˈseɪʃn/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"赔偿金；补偿"}]},{"word":"environmentalist","phonetic":"/ɪnˌvaɪrənˈmentəlɪst/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"环境保护论者；环保人士"}]},{"word":"process","phonetic":"/ˈprɑːses/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（法律）程序，过程"}]},{"word":"consequence","phonetic":"/ˈkɑːnsɪkwens/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（尤指不好或重要的）结果，后果"}]}]}}

Hill Closes for New Year","topic":"London / New Year / Public Spaces","sources":["https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/primrose-hill-london-park-new-year-eve-fencing-b2471804.html"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"A famous place in London closes its gates. Primrose Hill is a popular park with a great view. People love to watch fireworks there. However, workers put a big fence around the hill this week. They do not want crowds there tonight during the party.

Local residents are angry about the change. They say the green wrapping on the gates looks bad. It is really ugly to see. The police want to keep everyone safe. They worry about too many people on the hill.

Now, the area is quiet and empty. Visitors cannot enter to see the show. People must go downtown to celebrate the New Year instead. The local shops and restaurants lose customers.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Residents in London were angry about a new safety measure at Primrose Hill. This famous location usually offers a beautiful view of the city fireworks. However, officials decided to close the area for New Year's Eve. They installed a large metal fence around the perimeter to stop crowds.

The Royal Parks made this decision because of major safety concerns. Last year, too many people visited the hill, and it became dangerous. Therefore, workers spent days wrapping the gates with heavy green material. This blocks the view completely.

Locals complained that the barriers looked really ugly and unwelcoming. They also worried about local businesses. Restaurants and bars needed customers from the crowd. Because the park was closed, visitors had to go downtown to celebrate instead. Even though the police guarded the area tonight, the mood in the neighborhood was not happy. Officials hoped the hill would remain empty and safe during the night.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A bitter dispute has erupted in London after officials sealed off Primrose Hill ahead of the New Year’s Eve celebrations. The Royal Parks, the organization responsible for the site, installed high barriers to prevent public access. Residents described the opaque green screening and temporary fence as an eyesore that ruins the scenic landscape.

The controversial decision stems from serious public safety concerns. During last year's festivities, a massive surge of visitors created dangerous conditions on the hill. Consequently, management decided to close the park completely this year. While the goal is safety, locals argue the measure is really excessive. They claim the wrapping around the gates is grotesque and hostile to the community.

Furthermore, business owners fear significant economic losses. Many pubs and restaurants rely on the influx of visitors who usually gather to watch the fireworks. With the viewing point closed, crowds will likely head downtown or stay home, bypassing local establishments entirely.

Despite the backlash, authorities remain firm on the closure for tonight. Police officers are patrolling the perimeter to ensure no one breaches the barriers. While the hill is usually a symbol of celebration, it stands silent and fortified this holiday season. The community hopes a better solution will be found for future events.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"fence","phonetic":"/fens/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"栅栏；围栏"}]},{"word":"tonight","phonetic":"/təˈnaɪt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"在今晚"}]},{"word":"wrapping","phonetic":"/ˈræpɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"包装材料；包裹物（文中指覆盖在门上的绿色遮挡物）"}]},{"word":"really","phonetic":"/ˈrɪəli/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"非常；很"}]},{"word":"downtown","phonetic":"/ˌdaʊnˈtaʊn/","definitions":[{"pos":"adv","definition":"往市中心；在市中心"}]},{"word":"park","phonetic":"/pɑːrk/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"公园"}]}]}}

Charles Sends Message","topic":"Royalty","sources":["https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/875762/king-charles-utterly-heartbreaking-statement-ski-resort-fire/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"King Charles sends a message for the new year. He is the king of the UK. He talks about hope and love for 2026. Families enjoy a big meal together during the holidays. They eat a special supper. People look forward to tomorrow with happiness. Harry and Meghan also celebrate in America.

They like the bubble in their drinks. However, there is sad news from Switzerland. A fire starts at a party. Many young people are there. A teenager is hurt in the fire. The King is very sad about this event. He sends his love to the families.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"King Charles III shared a meaningful message for the New Year. He looked back at the past and set a hopeful tone for 2026. The Royal Family recently spent Christmas together at Sandringham.

During the holiday, they enjoyed a traditional supper with loved ones. In California, Prince Harry and Meghan also celebrated. They raised a glass with a bubble of champagne to welcome the new year.

However, a sad event happened in Switzerland. A terrible fire broke out at a ski resort party on New Year's Eve. This tragedy hurt many young people. The King sent a message of support immediately. He felt deep sadness for every teenager involved in the accident. He described the event as a nightmare. Despite the sadness, he asked everyone to look toward tomorrow with strength. He praised the people who helped during the fire. This mix of hope and sadness marks the start of the year.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"King Charles III has delivered a poignant New Year message that balances optimism for 2026 with profound grief over a recent tragedy. Following the festive season, the British monarch addressed the nation to encourage unity and resilience. Earlier, the Royal Family gathered at Sandringham for their traditional celebrations, which typically include a formal Christmas supper. Across the Atlantic, Prince Harry and Meghan reportedly welcomed the New Year in California, perhaps watching the final bubble rise in their champagne glasses.

However, the start of the year was marred by a devastating fire at a ski resort in Crans-Montana, Switzerland. The incident occurred during a New Year’s Eve party and resulted in significant loss. King Charles quickly responded to the disaster with a heartfelt statement. He expressed his shock and deep sadness regarding the event, which heavily impacted the youth community. The monarch noted how painful it is when a night of celebration turns into a nightmare for a teenager and their family.

In his address, the King praised the emergency services for their bravery. While he hopes for a brighter tomorrow, his message serves as a somber reminder of the fragility of life. This blend of celebration and mourning sets a complex and emotional tone for the beginning of the royal year.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":5,"used_count":5,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"king","phonetic":"/kɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"国王；君主"}]},{"word":"supper","phonetic":"/ˈsʌpər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"晚餐"}]},{"word":"tomorrow","phonetic":"/təˈmɒrəʊ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"明天；未来"}]},{"word":"bubble","phonetic":"/ˈbʌbl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"气泡"}]},{"word":"teenager","phonetic":"/ˈtiːneɪdʒər/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（13至19岁的）青少年"}]}]}}

The event is the Winter WINEland. It takes place on the 17th and 18th. This seasonal party happens on the famous Wine Road. Many people travel here for the weekend.

Visitors stop at each winery on the map. The winter sky looks very blue. The cold air feels gentle on the face. The quiet vineyards look beautiful today. Nature is very poetic in the winter.

Guests drink good wine with their friends. This activity is a fun pastime for adults. Everyone smiles and laughs together. It is a joyful start to the new year.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Sonoma County prepared for a major celebration in January 2026. The 33rd annual Winter WINEland took place on January 17 and 18. Organizers transformed the famous Wine Road into a beautiful destination. They invited guests to enjoy this special seasonal event with friends.

Visitors traveled through the valley under the winter sky. Although the air was cold, the atmosphere felt gentle and calm. The sleeping vineyards created a quiet scene. Many travelers said the view was truly poetic. It was like a painting come to life.

People stopped at each winery along the long route. They tasted delicious drinks in warm rooms. For many visitors, tasting wine was a favorite pastime during the holidays. Additionally, the staff offered great hospitality at every stop.

Friends shared stories and laughed together all day. The mood was happy and joyful inside the tasting rooms. As a result, everyone created great memories. It was a perfect way to begin the new year.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"The renowned Wine Road in Sonoma County is preparing to welcome visitors for the annual Winter WINEland. Scheduled for January 17 and 18, 2026, this seasonal event promises to transform the region into a picturesque winter wonderland. Organizers have curated an experience that invites attendees to explore the quiet beauty of the vineyards under crisp winter skies.

According to local tourism officials, the event is more than a simple tasting tour. It serves as an artistic expression of the landscape. The dormant vines create a poetic backdrop for travelers seeking tranquility. While the air outside may be crisp, the hospitality inside remains gentle and warm, providing a cozy refuge from the elements.

Participants will travel from one winery to another, enjoying diverse varietals and distinct atmospheres. For connoisseurs and casual drinkers alike, exploring the Wine Road has become a cherished pastime. Each location offers a unique educational opportunity, allowing guests to discover new favorites while engaging directly with winemakers.

The primary goal of the festival is to foster connection. It provides a joyful environment where friends can reunite after the holidays. By combining excellent viticulture with social interaction, Winter WINEland offers a perfect start to the new year, ensuring that every guest leaves with lasting memories.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"poetic","phonetic":"/poʊˈetɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"富有诗意的，优美的"}]},{"word":"gentle","phonetic":"/ˈdʒentl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"温和的，轻柔的"}]},{"word":"joyful","phonetic":"/ˈdʒɔɪfl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"快乐的，喜悦的"}]},{"word":"pastime","phonetic":"/ˈpæstaɪm/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"消遣，娱乐活动"}]},{"word":"winery","phonetic":"/ˈwaɪnəri/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"酿酒厂，葡萄酒庄"}]},{"word":"seasonal","phonetic":"/ˈsiːzənl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"季节性的，随季节变化的"}]}]}}

e","sadden","household","appeal","regrettable","vocabulary","uniform","confident","utmost","drug","odorous","repeatedly","distant","generate","permissible","drill","indicative","somewhat","utilization","profound","thousand","initially","dropout","weird","curriculum","assist","confrontation","frog","heir","counterpart","negotiable","modesty","rhythmic","chef","staple","speculation","observer","bake","principal","pretend","fluency","chew","fairy","rub","cousin","overcome","exemplary","exploit","bother","adverb","deprive","charity"],"selected":["oceanic","haul","witness","novel","intact","commercial"]},"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"result":{"title":"Massive Medieval Ship Found in Denmark","topic":"History and Archaeology","sources":["https://arkeonews.net/massive-medieval-cog-ship-discovered-off-denmark-the-emma-maersk-of-the-middle-ages/"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Experts find an old ship near Denmark. This ship is 600 years old. It sits deep in the water. The discovery is very important for history.

The ship is very big. It carries a large haul of goods. This shows old commercial trade. The ship is still strong. Its body is surprisingly intact. Most old ships break, but this one is whole.

We witness a special moment today. This is a novel event for science. It teaches us about the oceanic past. The team works hard to save the ship.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"Can you imagine a ship from 600 years ago? Recently, archaeologists found a massive vessel near Copenhagen, Denmark. This ship, named Svælget 2, rested quietly underwater for six centuries. It is the largest ship of its kind ever found.

The ship was a giant of its time. It carried a heavy haul of up to 300 tons. This large capacity showed the strong commercial ambition of the past. It moved many goods across the sea for trade.

Experts were shocked by the ship's condition. The wooden structure remained intact after many years. Usually, old ships are broken, but this one was complete. It was a novel discovery for the scientific team to see such a perfect boat.

Today, we witness a piece of Denmark's oceanic heritage. The team recorded the recovery process carefully. This project helps us learn about medieval life and the sea. It is a great gift from history.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A groundbreaking discovery has emerged from the cold waters of the Øresund Strait near Copenhagen. Archaeologists have identified a 600-year-old shipwreck as the largest cog ship ever found. Known as Svælget 2, this vessel represents a significant chapter in medieval maritime history and engineering.

The ship’s massive dimensions reflect the impressive scale of medieval trade. Capable of carrying a cargo of 300 tons, the vessel demonstrates the intense commercial ambition of that era. It served as a vital heavy freighter in the economic networks that connected European nations centuries ago.

Remarkably, the ship has remained largely intact despite resting 13 meters underwater for six centuries. While most medieval wrecks are typically found in fragments, Svælget 2 is exceptionally well-preserved from keel to deck. This rare preservation offers researchers a novel opportunity to study historical shipbuilding techniques and materials in unprecedented detail.

The recovery operation was a monumental logistical task. Experts carefully managed the haul of the heavy timbers to ensure their safety during the lifting process. This project allows the modern world to witness Denmark's rich oceanic heritage firsthand. By saving this vessel, archaeologists have secured a tangible connection to the past, providing invaluable insights into the lives of those who once navigated these northern waters.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"oceanic","phonetic":"/ˌəʊʃiˈænɪk/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"海洋的；大海的"}]},{"word":"haul","phonetic":"/hɔːl/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"（用力）拖拉；搬运；（一次）运送量"}]},{"word":"witness","phonetic":"/ˈwɪtnəs/","definitions":[{"pos":"v","definition":"见证；目击"}]},{"word":"novel","phonetic":"/ˈnɒvl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"新奇的；新颖的"}]},{"word":"intact","phonetic":"/ɪnˈtækt/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"完好无损的；完整的"}]},{"word":"commercial","phonetic":"/kəˈmɜːʃl/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"商业的；贸易的"}]}]}}

Experiment Proves Einstein Wrong","topic":"Science","sources":["https://phys.org/news/2026-01-01-real-life-niels-bohr-theoretical.html"],"articles":[{"level":1,"level_name":"Easy","content":"Scientists finish a big experiment on December 31. It is about physics and the world. They look at very small parts of the universe. Albert Einstein is a famous man of science. He is famous for his work on relativity. However, he did not like some ideas about chance.

He saw a limitation in those old ideas. A new test now proves him wrong. It shows the virtue of Niels Bohr's work. The test gives the true meaning of reality. This is a moment of enlightenment for science. The result is profound for us all.","difficulty_desc":"Elementary (A1-A2)"},{"level":2,"level_name":"Medium","content":"A major scientific experiment ended a long debate in physics last week. For one hundred years, scientists argued about how the universe works. On December 31, researchers proved that Niels Bohr was right about quantum mechanics. This news surprised many people because Albert Einstein had a different view.

Einstein was famous for his theory of relativity. However, he questioned the meaning of random events in atoms. He famously said that God does not play dice with the universe. He believed there was a limitation in Bohr's ideas regarding chance.

The new study showed the virtue of Bohr's original theory. The experiment proved that tiny particles act in strange ways that are hard to predict. Einstein’s classical intuition could not explain these events clearly.

This discovery offered profound knowledge about our complex world. It provided a new path to scientific enlightenment for students and experts. We now understand that the universe is much more complex than Einstein once thought.","difficulty_desc":"Intermediate (B1-B2)"},{"level":3,"level_name":"Hard","content":"A century-old debate that defined modern physics has finally reached a conclusion following a groundbreaking experiment conducted on December 31, 2025. Researchers have provided concrete evidence validating the principles of quantum mechanics, effectively settling a historical disagreement between two titans of science. For decades, the theoretical battle lines were drawn between Albert Einstein and Niels Bohr regarding the fundamental nature of reality.

Although Einstein is globally celebrated for his theory of relativity, he maintained significant skepticism regarding quantum theory. He famously argued that "God does not play dice," expressing his doubt about the probabilistic nature of the subatomic world. He believed there was a limitation in Bohr's model and questioned the true meaning of a reality based on chance rather than certainty.

However, the recent findings highlight the enduring virtue of Bohr’s quantum predictions. The experiment demonstrated that classical intuition fails completely when applied to the behavior of particles at the subatomic level. It confirmed that the universe operates on complex probabilities that defy the traditional logic Einstein preferred.

This scientific milestone offers profound insight into the mechanics of existence. It provides a new level of enlightenment for physicists who have long sought to understand these deeper mysteries of creation. As the scientific community moves forward, this discovery not only closes a chapter on a historic rivalry but also opens exciting new avenues for exploring the complex fabric of our universe.","difficulty_desc":"Advanced (C1+)"}],"word_usage_check":{"target_words_count":6,"used_count":6,"missing_words":[]},"word_definitions":[{"word":"relativity","phonetic":"/ˌrel.əˈtɪv.ə.ti/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"相对论（爱因斯坦提出的物理学理论）"}]},{"word":"virtue","phonetic":"/ˈvɜː.tʃuː/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"优点，长处；价值"}]},{"word":"meaning","phonetic":"/ˈmiː.nɪŋ/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"意义；含义"}]},{"word":"enlightenment","phonetic":"/ɪnˈlaɪ.tən.mənt/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"启迪，教化；（科学上的）开悟"}]},{"word":"limitation","phonetic":"/ˌlɪm.ɪˈteɪ.ʃən/","definitions":[{"pos":"n","definition":"局限性；限制"}]},{"word":"profound","phonetic":"/prəˈfaʊnd/","definitions":[{"pos":"adj","definition":"深远的；深刻的"}]}]}}
